FlavorTextOption.Text: Árvore Mestre Tecnologia
Todos as Techs
Uma árvore tecnológica equilibrada.
Engenharia
Permite a construção de hiperdrives e cascos minúsculos.

Por gerações, olhamos para as estrelas e nos perguntamos: "E se?". Apertem bem o cinto, porque "se" aconteceu. Dobrando o espaço ao redor de nossas naves podemos usar a propulsão convencional em uma bolsa de espaço normal enquanto aceleramos a velocidades incríveis.
Manufatura de precisão
Permite a construção de instalações de fabricação exótica.

Alguns de nossos processos de fabricação mais precisos resistiram à mudança para fora do mundo, lutando com a ampla gama de ambientes aos quais estão agora expostos. Pensamos tê-lo agora, mas ainda assim recomendamos que você invista em garantias estendidas.
Foco na fabricação
Melhora os edifícios de fabricação.
Não há como contornar isso: "Melhorias incrementais nas técnicas de fabricação" não é uma grande manchete. O que é uma vergonha, considerando os benefícios que esperamos ver deles.
Indústria Militar
Melhora a capacidade de fabricação militar.

O uso de ferramentas em nossos centros de fabricação para nos especializarmos na produção militar envia uma mensagem muito pouco amigável a qualquer pessoa que nos preste muita atenção. No entanto, isso deve fazer os meninos e meninas em fadigas de camuflagem adaptativas felizes.
Indústria social
Melhora a capacidade de fabricação civil.

Um dos efeitos colaterais imprevistos da gestão de uma civilização nesta escala é encontrar coisas a ver com todas estas pessoas. Mantê-los felizes é tão importante quanto mantê-los seguros, e às vezes pode ser muito difícil para eles.
Fabricação competitiva
Reduz os custos de fabricação.

Pensamos tirá-los de lá após a última vez, mas mais alguns contadores conseguiram entrar em nossos centros de fabricação. Ou eles estão vivendo agora nas paredes. Independentemente disso, eles encontraram mais algumas maneiras de reduzirmos nossas despesas gerais de fabricação.
Especialização industrial
Permite a construção das mais modernas instalações de fabricação.

Manipulando materiais a nível atômico, podemos agora construir coisas de precisão inigualável. Isto ampliou maciçamente nossa capacidade industrial, juntamente com a criação de uma classe inteiramente nova de questões de segurança no local de trabalho bastante aterrorizantes.
Domínio industrial
Melhora os edifícios de fabricação.
Se pode ser sonhado, nós podemos construí-lo. De fato, muitos de nossos economistas acreditam agora que o fator limitador de nossa capacidade industrial é a nossa própria imaginação.
Mestre da Montagem Militar
Melhora a capacidade de fabricação militar.
Aos poucos, estamos descobrindo as últimas eficiências possíveis em nossos processos de fabricação militar, nossa civilização se transformando lentamente em uma máquina de guerra em si.
Mestre da construção social
Melhora a capacidade de produção social.

Poucos de nossos civis parecem se dar conta do desafio de construir as fazendas, hospitais e complexos de entretenimento dos quais eles dependem para sobreviver. E no entanto, toda vez que tentamos dizer-lhes o quanto estamos fazendo isso agora, eles apenas bocejam e vão embora.
Pesquisa institucional
Permite a construção de instalações de pesquisa melhoradas.

Estamos no nosso melhor quando não estamos apenas vivendo neste universo, mas observando-o. Descobrindo-o. Às vezes desmantelando pequenas partes dele. Ao criar lugares especiais para que isso aconteça, esperamos que os avanços da pesquisa ocorram com muito mais freqüência.
Otimização da pesquisa
Melhora os edifícios de pesquisa.

Os pesquisadores são ótimos em inventar coisas, mas surpreendentemente maus no negócio de inventar coisas. Várias práticas de pesquisa ineficientes se desenvolveram, as quais realmente precisamos melhorar.
Pesquisa otimizada
Aumenta a capacidade de pesquisa.
Melhoramos e tornamos mais eficientes muitas de nossas práticas de pesquisa, o que deveria levar a pesquisas mais rápidas ou, no mínimo, menos pesquisadores reclamando da burocracia.
Redução dos custos de pesquisa
Reduz o custo de fabricação de melhorias na pesquisa.

Com a pressa de começar a processar e analisar todos os novos dados que nossa rápida expansão proporcionou, uma série de práticas de pesquisa horrivelmente esbanjadoras tornou-se comum. Eliminando essas práticas, devemos ser capazes de tornar nossa pesquisa um pouco mais barata.
Pesquisa sustentável
Reduz os custos de manutenção de melhorias na pesquisa.

Os laboratórios de pesquisa estão cheios de brinquedos caros que estão em um estado quase constante de avaria. Ao considerarmos como fazer parte disto de forma mais sustentável, esperamos ver uma ampla economia de custos ao longo da vida útil de um laboratório.
Centros de pesquisa
Permite a construção de instalações de pesquisa avançada.

Ao colocar todas as nossas pessoas mais inteligentes e seus brinquedos favoritos no mesmo prédio, esperamos ver melhorias significativas em nossa capacidade de pesquisar novos campos. Além disso, lhes daremos comida para que não tenham motivos para sair.
Foco tecnológico
Melhora os edifícios de pesquisa.

O equipamento de laboratório necessário para pesquisar alguns destes novos campos é incrivelmente caro e esotérico. A especialização de nossos esforços de pesquisa pode ser necessária para fazer os avanços mais rápidos.
Pesquisa focada
Aumenta a capacidade de pesquisa.
Ao concentrar nossos esforços em pesquisa pura, conseguimos obter uma melhoria significativa na taxa de novas descobertas.
Foco na produção de pesquisa
Reduz o custo de melhorias na pesquisa.
Ao concentrar nossos esforços em nossa infra-estrutura de pesquisa, conseguimos reduzir o custo de construção de novas instalações.
Economia da Pesquisa
Reduz a manutenção de melhorias na pesquisa.
Ao focar como nossos pesquisadores trabalham e eliminar alguns dos experimentos mais esbanjadores, conseguimos reduzir significativamente a manutenção de nossas instalações de pesquisa.
Pesquisa integrada
Permite a construção de instalações de pesquisa exóticas.

Fizemos grandes avanços em nossa compreensão do universo e agora precisamos de academias maiores para facilitar os estudos multidisciplinares necessários para empurrar o véu mais para trás. Os pesquisadores também estão exigindo algo chamado de "Bar da faculdade".
Matriz de Pesquisa
Permite a construção das mais modernas instalações de pesquisa.

Imagine milhões de cientistas, trabalhando em uma instalação de pesquisa do tamanho de uma cidade, sem nenhuma das distrações do mundo exterior, como o clima ou o contato social básico. Sim, alguns se transformarão em psicopatas. Mas estávamos planejando ficar de olho neles de qualquer maneira.
Conhecimento profundo
Permite a construção de instalações de pesquisa profunda.

Nossa compreensão do universo tem crescido a passos largos. Equipes que fizeram um esforço para desacelerar e considerar algumas das implicações dessas descobertas estão agora revelando padrões mais profundos no tecido da realidade.
Conhecimento quântico
Permite a construção de instalações de pesquisa profunda melhoradas.

Nossas últimas instalações não estão mais tateando às cegas no limite do mundo subatômico. Para começar, há vinte arestas, e são menos arestas que toroides, e agora, na verdade, há zero delas. Acontece que a realidade é super complicada.
Além da Mortalidade
Permite a construção de instalações avançadas de pesquisa profunda. Prepara a civilização para a Ascensão.
A ascensão nos tornará imortais, e nos conduzirá a uma realidade que está além desta. O que lá está permanece um mistério, mas nunca nos afastamos deles antes.
Coordenação de Pesquisa
Permite a construção de instalações de apoio à pesquisa.

A pesquisa coordenada só tem se tornado mais desafiadora à medida que nossa civilização tem crescido. Os Centros de Coordenação de Pesquisa devem ajudar a amenizar esse desafio, minimizando qualquer duplicação de esforços, e melhorar a produtividade das instalações de pesquisa vizinhas.
Neuroligação
Permite a construção de melhores instalações de apoio à pesquisa.

Os benefícios da comunicação direta cérebro a cérebro serão sentidos em uma grande variedade de campos, mas considerando o quão incômodos socialmente muitos de nossos pesquisadores são, suspeitamos que eles serão os que mais lucrarão em viver em um mundo sem conversa fiada.
Planetologia
Permite-nos começar a modificar o ambiente de mundos alienígenas.

Metade da diversão de mudar-se para um novo lugar é consertá-lo de acordo com suas necessidades. Isso é mais difícil quando o novo lugar é todo um planeta alienígena, mas finalmente estamos desenvolvendo as ferramentas e técnicas para fazer exatamente isso.
Especialização planetária
Melhora as fazendas.
Fizemos grandes progressos com nossas técnicas de colonização nos últimos anos e agora podemos começar a considerar áreas específicas que gostaríamos de melhorar.
Melhoria do solo
Permite-nos começar a terraformar nossos mundos.

Nossa tecnologia agrícola melhorou drasticamente e, como resultado, estamos começando a ver um aumento no rendimento das colheitas. As cenouras ainda têm aquele gosto estranho, mas estamos trabalhando para isso.
Crescimento Acelerado
Aumenta o crescimento populacional.

Agora que somos capazes de modular os efeitos que um mundo estranho tem sobre a fertilidade, nossas taxas de crescimento populacional estão começando a subir. Mais bebês por enquanto, mas mais trabalhadores em breve.
Produção aperfeiçoada
Aumenta a produção.

Não estamos mais apenas sobrevivendo em novos mundos, mas prosperando lá. Graças ao melhor rendimento em nutrientes e técnicas de preservação, nossos trabalhadores podem trabalhar mais e mais, melhorando a capacidade de produção de toda a nossa civilização.
Adaptação agrícola
Permite a construção de fazendas melhoradas. Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

Adaptar nossa experiência agrícola para se adaptar a uma variedade de ambientes estranhos provou ser um desafio, e levou muitos avanços simultâneos em nosso entendimento do solo, da ciência atmosférica e das pás. É isso mesmo. Em alguns planetas, precisamos de pás especiais.
Otimização agrícola
Melhora as fazendas.
A otimização de nossos processos agrícolas levará a uma série de benefícios que ajudarão nossa civilização por muito tempo. Até que as pessoas deixem de precisar de alimentos, realmente.
Aceleração da agricultura
Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

Adaptar nossos regimes de plantio, alimentação e colheita para levar em conta as diferenças nas estações dos mundos alienígenas exige muito esforço e tem que ser bem sintonizado em todos os planetas. Mas agora que somos capazes de fazer isso, esperamos ver um maior rendimento alimentar.
Agricultura Eficiente
Reduz o custo das fazendas.

Agora que temos mais experiência no cultivo de alimentos em mundos alienígenas, nossos engenheiros agrícolas são capazes de prever com antecedência o equipamento agrícola que uma colônia precisará antes de ser formada, levando a custos mais baixos para o início das operações.
Agricultura Sustentável
Reduz o custo de manutenção das fazendas.
Dando um passo atrás na vanguarda da ciência agrícola, e utilizando equipamentos mais antigos e mais confiáveis, podemos reduzir os custos de funcionamento da maior parte de nossas fazendas.
Culturas de Alto Rendimento
Permite a construção de fazendas avançadas.
A maximização da produção alimentar de um determinado terreno de solo é um passo caro, mas muito necessário para aqueles mundos onde a terra arável vem com um prêmio.
Foco na agricultura
Melhora as fazendas.

Embora toda essa atenção que prestamos ao aperfeiçoamento de nossas técnicas agrícolas às vezes deixa nossos agricultores desconfortáveis - eles se estabelecem em seus caminhos - as melhorias em nossa capacidade de produção de alimentos são grandes demais para serem ignoradas.
Foco Nutricional
Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

Os micróbios presentes em solo alienígena reagem de forma diferente aos nutrientes do que estamos acostumados, e é preciso algum tempo para afinar nossas técnicas de fertilização para manter nossas próprias plantas alimentadas. Mas agora que o fizemos, esperamos ver uma produção alimentar ainda maior.
Foco na adaptabilidade da fazenda
Reduz o custo das fazendas.

Por fim, nos debruçamos sobre as espécies e cepas de plantas que se adaptam à mais ampla gama de ambientes. Ao concentrar nossos esforços de produção nessas culturas, os custos de arranque de qualquer fazenda devem agora ser muito mais gerenciáveis.
Foco na gestão da fazenda
Reduz os custos de manutenção das fazendas.

Os agricultores de toda a nossa civilização estão enfrentando desafios agrícolas únicos todos os dias. Ao implementar sistemas de compartilhamento de informações em toda a civilização, podemos difundir ainda mais nossas melhores práticas, reduzindo os custos operacionais agrícolas em todos os lugares.
Agricultura sem perda
Permite a construção de fazendas exóticas.

As melhorias em nossos sistemas de reciclagem e entrega de nutrientes levaram a fazendas quase perfeitamente eficientes. Nossos agricultores não precisam nem mesmo sujar as mãos agora, e na verdade estão ficando um pouco preciosos com isso.
Domínio agrícola
Melhora as fazendas.

Nossas fazendas fornecem agora uma recompensa quase ilimitada, a comida fazendo grande parte do trabalho árduo em si. É certo que a primeira vez que você vê uma auto-colheita de plantas ou de animais é um pouco sinistra, e as excursões escolares certamente se tornaram muito mais difíceis.
Mestres Agricultores
Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

Nossa capacidade de produção de alimentos deu mais um passo à frente. Além disso, finalmente tiramos aquele gosto estranho das cenouras, mas acontece que agora todos gostam, então tivemos que colocá-lo de volta.
Abundância
As fazendas aumentam o crescimento populacional.
Temos uma quantidade tão excessiva de alimentos agora que muitos de nosso povo tomaram quase como um desafio criar famílias capazes de consumir tudo isso.
Distribuição de alimentos
Permite a construção de edifícios de apoio à agricultura. Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

Parece entediante, e na verdade também é entediante, mas graças aos avanços na xeno-contabilidade e a melhoria resultante na logística de nosso sistema de distribuição de alimentos, estamos agora economizando muitos alimentos que antes tinham sido desperdiçados.
Xeno Irrigação
Permite a construção de edifícios melhorados de apoio à agricultura. Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

Há uma série de desafios surpreendentes ao irrigar um planeta alienígena, devido à incrível variedade de condições gravitacionais, do solo e da atmosfera que encontramos. Além disso, a água está, em muitos casos, escondida.
Resequenciamento de Biomassa
Permite a construção de edifícios avançados de apoio à agricultura. Aumenta a produção de alimentos.

Fundamentalmente, os alimentos são pouco mais que longas cadeias de carbono dispostas em moléculas que achamos digeríveis e saborosas. Plantas e animais têm feito um bom trabalho de sequenciamento dessas cadeias até hoje, mas não está na hora de deixarmos um robô abrir uma fenda?
Xeno Biologia
Permite a construção de instalações médicas melhoradas. Aumenta o crescimento populacional.

Compreender como os seres humanos se adaptam ao ambiente microbiológico de mundos alienígenas será fundamental para nossas chances de sobrevivência quando colonizarmos as estrelas. Perder uma colônia para uma diarréia catastrófica simplesmente não é uma opção.
Melhoria da População
Permite a construção de instalações médicas avançadas. Aumenta o crescimento populacional.

É preciso muito romance, mas para que nossas colônias tenham sucesso, elas precisam de bebês, e precisam deles rapidamente. Dedicar mais recursos para melhorar a fertilidade e a música de humor deve ajudar.
Bio-replicação
Permite a construção de instalações médicas exóticas. Aumenta o crescimento populacional.

Uma vez que tiramos todas as partes divertidas da reprodução, fomos capazes de aumentar drasticamente nossas taxas de crescimento. Claro, a bio-replicação pode estar nos levando a um mundo de pesadelo de conformismo e menos vagas de estacionamento disponíveis. Mas vamos conseguir de alguma forma.
Engenharia Ambiental
Permite a melhoria do solo e melhora os efeitos do terreno adjacente.
Nossa capacidade de melhorar e melhorar o ambiente em que trabalhamos trará benefícios a quase todos os aspectos da colonização e tornará os passeios ao ar livre um pouco menos mortais.
Colonização Extrema
Permite a instalação em mundos extremos, com potencial de produção reduzido.
Não estamos mais limitados aos frutos de baixo peso do estoque de planetas da galáxia. Não será uma vida fácil para ninguém que vive nestes novos mundos, mas será uma vida.
Foco em Colonização
Melhora o potencial de mundos extremos.
O domínio da vida num mundo extremo tornará a vida lá muito mais tolerável para os pobres tolos que se voluntariaram para isso.
Domínio do Mundo Aquático
Normaliza a Produção de Mundos Aquáticos, e aumenta sua riqueza e Turismo.

Nossa experiência lidando com os desafios da vida no mundo aquático nos permitiu tornar a vida lá quase tão confortável quanto em qualquer outro lugar de nossa civilização. Os bonés de banho não são mais obrigatórios.
Domínio do Mundo Congelado
Normaliza a Produção de Mundos Congelados, e aumenta sua Pesquisa e Influência.
Agora somos tão bons em viver em mundos de bola de neve que muitos colonos passam dias sem usar luvas, algo que teria sido considerado imprudente mesmo há alguns anos atrás.
Domínio do Mundo Árido
Normaliza a Produção de Mundos Áridos, e impulsiona sua Produção e Militares.

Foi necessária alguma tecnologia de reciclagem de água cara e maciçamente invasiva para fazê-lo, mas a vida em mundos áridos é agora mais ou menos tão produtiva quanto em qualquer outro lugar. Os cateteres agora também são muito mais confortáveis.
Limpeza Atmosférica
Permite a instalação em mundos radioativos e tóxicos, com potencial de produção reduzido.
Mesmo os ambientes planetários mais sujos e tóxicos podem agora ser colonizados por nós. Boa sorte para os pobres bastardos que vão em busca disso, mas ao menos agora terão uma chance de lutar.
Perfeição da Biosfera
Melhora o potencial de mundos extremos.
Nossos colonos não devem mais morrer sem causa. Mesmo os mais mortíferos dos planetas são agora perfeitamente ultrapassáveis para nós.
Domínio mundial radioativo
Normaliza a Produção de Mundos Radioativos, e aumenta sua capacidade de Produção.

As mutações e defeitos genéticos que eram um fato da vida dos primeiros colonizadores de mundos radioativos são agora coisa do passado. Quaisquer outras mutações serão deixadas em vigor apenas para fins cosméticos.
Domínio do Mundo Tóxico
Normaliza a Produção de Mundos Tóxicos, e aumenta sua produção de Pesquisa.

Temos dominado os desafios de viver até mesmo nos planetas mais venenosos. Você ainda não vai querer ir para fora sem seu capacete, mas nós mudamos a maioria dos lugares que valem a pena ir para dentro de qualquer maneira.
Terraformação
Permite-nos acrescentar mais azulejos de uso em nossos planetas.
A terraformação é um negócio complicado, delicadamente posicionado entre tornar um mundo mais habitável para nós sem destruir toda a sua biosfera para fazê-lo. E não há nenhuma " façanha".
Melhoria do habitat
Permite-nos acrescentar mais azulejos de uso em nossos planetas.

Nossa capacidade de manipular a biosfera melhorou ao ponto de podermos tratar continentes inteiros como uma tela. Vamos pintar um retrato de uma civilização pujante e próspera? Ou o equivalente a escrever nossos nomes na neve na urina?
Reclamação do solo
Permite-nos acrescentar mais ladrilhos de uso em nossos planetas.

Muitos planetas fazem um trabalho muito pobre de tornar o terreno utilizável para fins coloniais. Onde a natureza deixou cair a bola, nós entramos, e agora somos capazes de desenvolver o que antes eram locais muito marginais.
Resequenciamento ambiental
Permite-nos acrescentar mais ladrilhos de uso em nossos planetas.

Agora estamos jogando com forças poderosas, capazes de manipular o terreno planetário em uma escala nunca vista antes. Devemos ter certeza de usar este poder com sabedoria, ou pelo menos não ativamente para o mal.
Viagens interestelares
Aumenta a velocidade de nossos navios.

Mesmo nas velocidades incríveis em que podemos viajar agora, se quisermos viajar para qualquer lugar além das estrelas mais próximas precisaremos fazer melhorias significativas em nossos sistemas de navegação e suporte de vida. Hiperdrives mais refinados também não fariam mal.
Especialização Interstelar
Melhora os sistemas de navios.
Agora que temos um pouco de experiência enviando navios para a escuridão e tendo a maioria deles voltando, descobrimos uma série de maneiras de melhorar nossos equipamentos e técnicas de navegação.
Especialização em Hiperdrive
Aumenta a velocidade de todos os navios.
Depois de analisar como nossa primeira geração de hiperdrives funcionou (e não funcionou), descobrimos uma série de maneiras de melhorar a velocidade de nossos navios.
Especialização em transporte
Reduz a massa dos módulos Colônia e Construtor.

Empurrar grandes Módulos de Suporte através do espaço é inerentemente um desperdício, ao miniaturizar e otimizar os componentes maiores, podemos caber mais em uma nave, permitindo que eles vão mais longe e mais rápido do que nunca.
Recirculação avançada
Aumenta o alcance de todos os navios.

Depois de ouvir as reclamações e tosses de nossas tripulações que retornaram, melhoramos os sistemas de recirculação de suporte de vida de nossos navios, o que deve aumentar marginalmente seu alcance efetivo.
Drive de íons
Permite a construção de hiperdrives melhorados.

Usando campos magnéticos para capturar íons do meio interestelar durante o vôo em hiperdrive, podemos canalizar essa massa adicional para o escapamento de nossos motores, aumentando nossa velocidade geral. Chamados de acionamentos de íons, eles nos fazem ir mais rápido, basicamente.
Otimização de íons
Melhora os drives.
Agora que os vimos em larga escala, identificamos uma série de maneiras de tornar nossos novos sistemas do Drive de íons mais eficientes.
Acionamentos de alto rendimento
Aumenta a velocidade de todos os navios.

A tecnologia de captura de íons de nossos drives de íons requer uma quantidade diabólica de afinação que os engenheiros de nosso navio estão apenas aprendendo a automatizar. Uma vez feito este trabalho, devemos ver velocidades ligeiramente mais altas em toda a nossa frota.
Fabricação de drives
Reduz o custo dos drives
Os geradores de hiper-campo não são mais os raros equipamentos que já foram, e estamos começando a ver eficiências de escala que reduziram o custo unitário para cada um deles.
Miniaturização de Drives
Reduz a massa de drives.
A cada ano nossos hiperdrives ficam mais eficientes e menores. Menos espaço para os motores significa mais espaço para tudo o mais, beneficiando todo tipo de navio que poderíamos conceber.
Teoria do Campo de Warp
Permite a construção de hiperdrives avançados.

Nossos pesquisadores agora são capazes de "empilhar" os campos de flexão espacial de nossos hiperdrives, ampliando seu efeito de aceleração. Eles chamam estes arranjos empilhados de "Campos de Warp" e estão agora utilizando-os para criar motores muito mais potentes.
Foco no campo de Warp
Fornece drives mais avançados para nossos navios.

A tecnologia de campo warp é incrivelmente complicada e, em mais de alguns casos, fez com que o cérebro de um pesquisador derretesse um pouco. Mas agora que temos alguma experiência trabalhando com eles, identificamos uma série de maneiras de melhorar seu projeto.
Foco no campo de Warp
Aumenta a velocidade de todos os navios.
Ajustando a disposição dos hiper-campos empilhados em uma variedade de dimensões, encontramos algumas formas surpreendentemente baratas de melhorar a velocidade de nossos propulsores de Warp.
Foco do Gerador de Campo
Reduz o custo dos drives.
Agora que estamos usando campos empilhados e geradores de múltiplos campos, mesmo a melhoria mais minúscula na relação custo-benefício pode levar a economias significativas.
Miniaturização do Gerador de Campo
Reduz a massa de drives.

Com um pouco de experiência trabalhando com os efeitos dos hipercampos empilhados, determinamos que os estávamos empilhando de forma ineficiente. Geradores de campo menores podem alcançar os mesmos efeitos que seus predecessores mais gordos.
Ondas Hiperwarp
Permite a construção de hiperdrives exóticos.

As Ondas Hyperwarp consistem em campos de urdidura em cascata na frente da embarcação, permitindo que um motor de urdidura comprima efetivamente o espaço já comprimido. Isso encobre uma série de questões matemáticas complicadas, mas o resultado final são acionamentos ainda mais rápidos.
Domínio do Hyperwarp
Melhora os drives.

Nossas naves já são as mais rápidas da galáxia, nossos engenheiros são anunciados como heróis onde quer que vão. Felizmente para nós, eles não gostam muito de sair, em vez disso preferem continuar procurando por mais melhorias para fazer em seus preciosos motores.
Manufatura de Drive Master
Reduz o custo dos drives.

Nenhuma outra civilização da galáxia pode igualar a nossa pela facilidade e eficiência com que construímos nossos motores. E ainda a engenhosidade humana pode encontrar maneiras de torná-los mais baratos.
Redução de massa de drive
Reduz a massa de drives.
Todos nós dominamos a tecnologia de hiper-campo, e agora somos capazes de espremer a maior velocidade possível até mesmo dos menores motores.
Dobra estelar
Permite a construção dos mais modernos hiperdrives.

O espaço dobrável estelar dobra em uma escala nunca antes vista, hiper-campos se aproximando do diâmetro de uma estrela. Nossas naves são agora as mais rápidas da galáxia, e talvez as mais rápidas que a galáxia já viu.
Projeção de Hiper-campo
Permite a construção e o aumento da velocidade dos módulos de suporte.

A análise cuidadosa da forma como as ondas de hiper-campo interagem quando os navios estão viajando em formação revelou a possibilidade de construir geradores de campo maiores, capazes de aumentar a eficiência do acionamento de toda uma frota.
Manipulação do Campo de Gravidade
Permite a construção e o aumento avançado da velocidade dos módulos de suporte.

Levou um longo tempo para finalmente encontrar o gravitão. Acabou ficando dentro de nós o tempo todo. Mas agora podemos usá-lo para gerar enormes campos de gravidade artificiais, o que deve melhorar a manobrabilidade e as opções táticas de nossas embarcações em combate.
Perturbação do Hiper-Campo
Permite a construção de módulos inimigos de redução de velocidade.

Analisando os efeitos de interferência de múltiplos campos de hiperondas de diferentes navios viajando em proximidade, podemos agora limitar a velocidade dos navios inimigos dentro do alcance de uma base estelar devidamente equipada.
Projeção de Campo Estelar
Permite a construção de módulos avançados de suporte de aumento de velocidade.

O Projetor de Campo Stellar permite que navios devidamente equipados " reboquem" navios efetivamente com menos capacidade de acionamento. A mesma tecnologia nos ajudará a melhorar as capacidades de ampliação de hiper-campo de nossos módulos de suporte.
Pesquisa Interstelar
Permite-nos aumentar nossa faixa de sensores.

"Olhe antes de pular", é um excelente conselho em todos os tipos de aspectos da vida e da construção da civilização galáctica. Agora finalmente temos os sensores e ferramentas de pesquisa para que nossas naves possam fazer exatamente isso.
Otimização de sensores
Melhora os sensores.
Um esforço concentrado para otimizar nossos sistemas de sensores poderia levar a uma série de diferentes melhorias ou eficiências.
Sensor Amplification
Aumenta o alcance do sensor.
A última geração de nanoprocessadores nos permite processar mais rapidamente os volumes maciços de informação que nossos sensores retornam, melhorando a eficácia geral de nossos sistemas de sensores.
Fabricação de Sensores
Reduz o custo dos sensores.

Os detectores de hiper-campo que nossos sensores utilizam foram originalmente empedrados a partir de acionamentos sobrando. Agora que temos equipamentos dedicados à fabricação de sensores, podemos esperar algumas economias significativas de custos.
Miniaturização de sensores
Reduz a massa dos sensores.
Our earliest sensors were crude, jury-rigged things, and if we begin swapping out their parts for dedicated sensor-specific equipment, we should see significant weight savings.
Energy Field Sensors
Allows construction of advanced sensors.
Improvements in our understanding of the effects of space folding have revealed that hyperdrives are detectable at much greater distances than previously believed.
Energy Field Focus
Improves sensors.
As is usually the case when equipment is sent to the field, the technicians who actually use our sensors soon came up with a number of different ways to improve their efficiency and effectiveness.
Sensor Field Augmentation
Increases sensor range.
Our technicians have found that by turning one of the knobs up, our sensor systems can see a bit further. We feel kind of dumb for not realizing this before.
Sensor Efficacy Focus
Reduces cost of sensors.
Our sensor systems had several redundant parts, which when stripped out has led to the production of cheaper, more efficient systems. The accountants are all very excited.
High Density Sensors
Reduces mass of sensors.

The creation of high-density field detection components should lead to more compact sensors, leaving our ship designers more room to install guns. Everyone wins. Except the people the guns are pointed at.
Subspace Sensors
Allows construction of exotic sensors.

Subspace is the 12-dimension space that lies at right angles to and a little bit behind our universe, and it took us a very long time to figure out how to look at it. The upshot is that we can now build a new generation of very powerful sensors.
Sensor Mastery
Improves sensors.
We don't anticipate any further increases in the viewing range of our sensors, not until we leave this universe for another one. But we can certainly make them a little more efficient.
Sensor Simplification
Reduces cost of sensors.

When a ragtag group of science-accountants teamed up with the goal of identifying cost savings in our most advanced sensor systems, few believed they had a chance. Many openly mocked them. Some people spit on them. But somehow they managed it.
Sensor Mass Reduction
Reduces mass of sensors.

A careful analysis of our newest sensor systems has revealed that several of their components don't technically have to exist in this universe. By shifting their workload into another plane, we can reduce the amount of mass we have to lug around in ours.
Targeting Assist
Allows construction of targeting and stealth modules.
A study of how our ships have performed in combat has led to a number of improvements in our tactical targeting systems. At the same time, we've devised a system which should confuse enemy sensors.
Targeting Support
Allows construction of targeting and jamming modules.
We've adapted our tactical sensor improvements into support modules, capable of allowing a single ship to provide sensor accuracy and jamming benefits to an entire fleet of vessels.
Xeno Archeology
Increases Precursor research, and begins the path towards Ascension.

For some time we've known of a race, or races, of long dead aliens called the Precursors. It's taken some time to adapt our survey systems to identify their relics, but now that we have, we hope to learn a few of their secrets.
Precursor Studies
Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

Now that we've had an opportunity to study a few precursor relics, we've been able to detect patterns in them which have allowed us to build a framework which should greatly aid future Precursor research efforts.
Precursor Relic Focus
Improves Precursor relic benefits.
Having captured a few Precursor relics and observed the impact they have on our research and culture, we can now try adjusting our Precursor studies to benefit specific areas of our civilization.
Precursor Technologist
Increases Precursor relic research benefits.

Understanding Precursor artifacts involves throwing out many of our pre-conceived notions about technology. Their interfaces don't just assume we have different anatomy; they assume we have different ways of thinking entirely.
Precursor Cultural Studies
Increases Precursor relic cultural benefits.

The public seems fascinated by the Precursors, and the relics we've found have had a surprising effect on our society. We can now try to capitalize on these cultural benefits. Souvenirs. Wacky catchphrases. Things like that.
Precursor Capitalization
Increases Precursor relic economic benefits.

Most of the Precursor relics we find are a mystery to us, doing little more than generating patterns of pretty lights. Though it turns out there is a massive consumer market for pretty lights which we might want to capitalize on.
Precursor Exploitation
Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

The study of Precursor relics requires very specialized equipment. The construction of dedicated facilities staffed with Precursor specialists will allow us to make the most of these incredible artifacts.
Precursor Engineering
Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

We're now able to try recreating some of the Precursor's technology. Extremely advanced fabrication equipment will be needed to continue this work, but the benefits to our other research programs could be immeasurable.
Precursor Understanding
Increases Precursor research. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

Precursor relics reveal their secrets to us with ease now, and we're close to building our own relics ourselves. We have almost as full an understanding of Precursor technology as the Precursors did themselves.
Life Support
Allows construction of improved life support systems.

It seems surprising that the factor limiting the travel range for our ships is its life support system, but there you have it. For anything less than a colony ship, keeping the occupants alive is now a bigger challenge than keeping the engines fueled.
Life Support Optimization
Improves life support systems.
Everyone in the navy is very excited that we're trying to optimize our life support systems, and would certainly cheer if they weren't conserving their air.
Improved Life Support
Increases ship range.

Our experience with the rigors of space travel, and the shrieked radio transmissions of the few who fell to the rigors of space travel, have revealed a number of small improvements we might be able to make to our existing life support systems.
Life Support Manufacturing
Reduces life support cost.
Reducing the cost of building life support systems is one of those things we often have to do that we don't want to advertise too much. It's hard enough finding naval recruits as it is.
Life Support Miniaturization
Reduces life support mass.
By minimizing the amount of weight and space our life support systems take up, we leave more room for our life reduction systems, which is what we're now calling guns.
Support Field Generation
Allows construction of advanced life support systems.

Our growing familiarity with force fields has enabled us to replace our mechanical life support systems with more elegant field based processors. Food is now stored in a single block of nutrient-rich sludge, piped directly into the user's mouth.
Support Field Focus
Improves life support systems.

Our early attempts at building field-based life support systems left behind many messes and many possible opportunities for improvement, which we're starting to identify now. Cleaning up the messes: that was the obvious one.
Support Range Focus
Increases ship range.

By aerating the nutrient sludge we provide our crews it takes up significantly more volume in their stomachs, making them feel full with less food. There are some associated problems with, uh, gas, but we're coming up with special filters to address that.
Support Manufacturing Focus
Reduces life support cost.
Our life support systems are now really, really cheap. Still effective though, let's not forget that. Maybe let's not even call them cheap. "Economical," or "Value," maybe.
Low Mass Support Systems
Reduces life support mass.
By using the latest generation of efficient field generators, and also putting our crews on a diet, we've been able to reduce the mass of our life support systems even more.
Promethion Support Systems
Allows construction of exotic life support systems.

The Promethion Support System extends our field life support further, with all the requirements for a living organism - oxygen, water, and food - now piped directly into that organism rather than left to float around and get on the equipment.
Life Support Mastery
Improves life support systems.
We have all but mastered direct-nutrient injection technologies, and now have left but a few additional efficiencies to wring out of these systems.
Support System Assembly
Reduces life support cost.

Some of the crews are finding out how little we're spending on their life support systems. "Do you think we're worthless?" they shout. And we don't, we really don't. They're not worthless at all! Worth less, yes. But that's different.
Support Mass Reduction
Reduces life support mass.

Our nutrient sludge now delivers itself to the crew using embedded Promethion field effectors, saving us the weight of carrying around heavy fixed effectors. The embedded effectors come out in the waste stream, ready for reuse. After cleaning, of course.
Lossless Support Systems
Allows construction of the ultimate life support systems.

Our life support systems are now close to perfect, wasting no resources whatsoever and recycling essentially all waste products. As an added bonus, the fields have been reduced in size and are now much less humiliating for the crew.
Support Field Mastery
Allows construction of fleet life support modules.

Our switch to field based life support systems has made it possible to offload some materials to other vessels. Additionally, it should now be possible to supplement fleets via unmanned supply probes launched from an appropriately equipped facility.
Exploration Extension
Allows construction of advanced fleet life support modules.

We've adapted the latest in Promethion support field technology to be used by our fleet-support vessels, thus increasing an entire fleet's travel range. Additionally, we've made significant improvements to our starbase life support extension modules.
Orbital Manufacturing
Allows construction of improved manufacturing buildings, and small hulls.

Moving our ship construction operations to micro-gravity environments will eventually allow for the construction of massive structures. We're not quite there yet, but the first step out of the well was always going to be the biggest.
Orbital Specialization
Improves logistics.
Now that we've watched a few construction projects accidentally collapse on themselves, we've identified a number of possible improvements we can make to our orbital construction techniques.
Skilled Starship Construction
Increases Shipyard manufacturing.

You can't put just anyone in a space suit and get them to build things in orbit. It turns out that most people don't understand what an orbit is. Some improved training programs should dramatically improve our orbital manufacturing capability.
Improved Logistics
Increases Logistics.

Getting material to the right orbit at the right time is something we're only just coming to grips with. It turns out that orbital plane change maneuvers are really expensive. But once we scale this up, our logistical ability should greatly improve.
Storage Maximization
Increases hull capacity.
Ironically enough, space is at a premium in space, inside of our hulls at least. Even small improvements in packing efficiencies are worth the effort of hunting them down.
Zero Gravity Construction
Allows construction of medium hulls.

Most of our initial attempts at micro-gravity construction used clumsy variations of ground-based techniques, not far removed from banging rocks together. Now that we have a little more experience, we should be able to build on a much larger scale.
Zero Gravity Optimization
Improves hulls.

We took a big step forward with our most recent adoption of true zero-gravity construction practices. Now, after a few trial runs and one teensy little accident, our engineers have identified further areas for improvement.
Hull Reinforcement
Increases hull hit points.
After donating a few hulls for weapons practice, we were able to see the structural damage inflicted on them, and identify structural reinforcements that should toughen each ship substantially.
Shipyard Efficiency
Reduces cost of hulls.
Worksite planning in an orbital environment is a seriously complicated business, but now that we've got the hang of it, we should see significant cost savings for every hull we construct.
High Capacity Hulls
Increases hull capacity.

We're now able to build hollow structural elements still capable of handling very high compression loads. By maximizing the use of these and routing various ancillary ship systems through the cavities, we can save space for mission critical equipment.
Large Scale Construction
Allows construction of large hulls.

Building larger hulls is more involved than just adding more stuff to them. Ensuring that they won't collapse under acceleration is a serious challenge. Seating, to ensure our crews doesn't collapse under acceleration is another surprising challenge.
Orbital Construction Focus
Improves hulls.

We're getting better and better at large scale construction with every passing day, and a number of more efficient design practices are beginning to show up on our engineers' drawing tables. Along with the offensive doodles which have always been there.
Hardened Hulls
Increases hull hit points.

It seems counter-intuitive, but by introducing very small weaknesses in the molecular structure of our hulls, we can make them deformable in controlled ways, making our hulls quite a bit more resilient.
Starship Manufacturing Focus
Reduces cost of hulls.
The latest generation of self-propelled manufacturing equipment will allow our workers to maneuver inside of hulls with much greater ease, reducing the challenge and expense of construction.
Hull Capacity Focus
Increases hull capacity.

As our hulls grew ever larger, we began to lose some of the art of packing that our predecessors had. But now thanks to the scale of our ships, even very small improvements in packing can lead to more room for everything else.
Massive Scale Construction
Allows construction of huge hulls.

We're building massive ships capable of blotting out the stars. Obviously any ship can blot out the stars if you get close enough to it. You just don't have to get very close to these ones for that to be the case. Nor would you want to.
Hull Mastery
Improves hulls.

We're still finding ways to improve our shipyards, even though they're already the envy of the civilized galaxy. In the uncivilized galaxy they're a bit less envied, but we've never gotten along with those guys anyways.
Master Shipwrights
Reduces cost of hulls.
That we build the best ships in the galaxy is undeniable, but that we do it so economically is what's really impressive. Our enemies have never been menaced so thriftily.
Hull Maximization
Increases hull capacity.
Thanks to advances in the field of bristling, never before have our ships been so bristling with weapons. They could also bristle with other things we suppose.
Hull Strengthening
Allows construction of tougher hulls.

Using new force field technologies, we've been able to embed strengthening fields within the structures of our vessels, making them substantially more resistant to damage. They also now tingle if you lick them.
Hull Repair Systems
Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.
The same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can now be used to conduct partial repairs as well, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.
Self Healing Hulls
Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

Tiny little self-replicating nanobots are capable of almost anything as long as we don't ask too many questions about them. Nanobot repair modules in our ships and starbases will be able to repair damage during battle itself.
Carriers
Allows construction of carrier modules.

Carrier combat will allow us to project force while keeping our capital ships out of danger. Fighters are a lot more replaceable and there's no shortage of volunteers to fly them. Apparently there's something glamorous about dying in a very small ship.
Carrier Focus
Improves carriers.
There's nothing like doing something a few times to see how terrible you are at it. After a few hilarious mishaps, we've identified a few ways we can improve our carrier operations.
Interceptor Drones
Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones
These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.
Guardian Drones
Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.
These tuff little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end, and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.
High Capacity Carriers
Allows construction of high capacity carrier modules.

Thanks to our latest generation of fighters, designed to be more compact and packable, and the improved repair, reloading, and recovery facilities that go with them, we're now able to deploy high-capacity carriers.
Interstellar Logistics
Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases Logistics.

It's one thing to build a ship, it's another thing to keep it running. None of this is exciting of course. Logistics officers are some of the most boring people you're ever likely to meet. But a necessary evil.
Logistical Optimization
Improves logistics.
A new generation of space accountants are becoming trained as we speak, capable of improving logistical efficiencies most people would be too bored to ever notice.
Advanced Logistics
Increases Logistics.
Now that we've figured out some of the issues relativistic travel creates with our timekeeping and administration, we've been able to significantly improve our logistical capacity.
High Output Mining
Increases mining production.

An asteroid mining operation is a ballet of activity, as boring machines, ore haulers, and repair drones swarm about an asteroid. Keeping these pieces moving is challenging, and improving the organization is a sure way to improve its output.
Sustainable Shipyards
Reduces Shipyard decay rate.

Shipyards are, by some measures, the most complicated constructs humanity has ever created. Any improvement we can make to the management and operation of these beasts will result in significant cost savings.
Fleet Logistics
Greatly increases Logistics.

Scaling up our naval operations to include large multi-vessel fleets has created a number of additional logistical challenges which we're only just now coming to grips with. We'll definitely stop sending ships out without oxygen now though.
Deep Space Logistics
Greatly increases Logistics.

Whether it's via unmanned probes, deep space caches, or our network of merchant vessels, keeping our fleets well stocked while our civilization expands has proven to be a tremendous, but still very boring, challenge.
Galactic Logistics
Greatly increases Logistics.
Our mastery of mass-scale logistics is the envy of the galaxy. Well. The part of the galaxy which gets excited about logistics.
Interstellar Mining
Allows construction of mining facilities.

We can't have ships without the resources to build them. The same can be said for lots of things actually. Improved mining technologies will benefit every aspect of our civilization. At least the aspects of our civilization which require building things.
High Efficiency Mining
Allows construction of improved mining facilities.

Our mining operations are capable of generating more resources while losing less miners than ever before. The miners rejoice! Well. Not rejoice, exactly. They seem less grumpy than usual. Still, that's something.
Resource Extraction
Allows construction of advanced mining facilities.

Valuable resources can be found in most asteroids in extremely low concentrations. Extracting these hasn't been practical until the development of probes capable of independently navigating the subsurface to collect the goodies within.
Lossless Mining
Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

Miniaturizing our resource extraction probes to the nano-scale has allowed for almost perfectly lossless resource extraction. Additionally, the rarest of rare resources can now feasibly be targeted for extraction.
Warfare
We can't be naive about who or what we might find in the galaxy. From this point on, our ships must be armed, whether to protect against a yet unseen enemy, or even ourselves.
Weapons Systems
Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

The best defense is a good offense. Interestingly, so is the best offense. With that in mind, we've developed weapon systems which should prove very well suited to space-based defense. And, as discussed, offense.
Weapons Specialization
Improves weapon systems.
By dedicating their efforts on a specific field of weapons technology, our researchers believe they can deliver a number of more efficient weapon systems.
Targeting Specialization
Increases the Accuracy of all weapon systems.
We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.
Miniaturization Specialization
Reduces the Mass of all weapons systems.
We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.
Production Specialization
Reduces the Cost of all weapons systems.
We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.
Beam Weapons
Allows construction of improved beam weapons.
Whether light, particles, or both at the same time, there's an awful lot of destructive potential in suddenly sending a lot of it all at one place.
Beam Weapon Optimization
Improves beam weapons.

Weapons researchers have to keep paces with advances in many other fields to get the most out of their inventions. Right now, recent advances in material sciences are opening the door to a new generation of more efficient weapons.
Focused Beam Weapons
Increases damage of beam weapons.
A new generation of the ultra transparent materials we use in our focusing crystals has made it possible to increase the damage output of our beam weapons.
Low-Cost Beam Weapons
Reduces cost of beam weapons.
Beam weapons will never be cheap, but some economies of scale have led to price reductions in the magnification and focusing equipment these weapons rely upon.
Beam Weapons Miniaturization
Reduces mass of beam weapons.
Lacking the requirements for ammunition storage, beam weapons have always been mass-efficient. And after some hard work by the boys and girls in the lab, now they're a bit more so.
Matter Disruption
Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

Our researchers have been able to weaponize a collimated beam of particles capable of disrupting the strong nuclear force, severing the bonds which hold the nucleus together, turning matter into smaller chunks of matter.
High Energy Focus
Improves beam weapons.

A careful analysis of data returned from the field has revealed a number of inefficiencies which we can begin addressing in the next generation of our beam systems. We may also finally be able to get rid of that funny smell they make.
Beam Amplification
Increases damage of beam weapons.

Advances in crystallography have created a new generation of focusing crystals capable of handling much greater quantities of energy without fracturing. All of our beam weapons just got a little bit badder.
Beam Manufacturing Focus
Reduces cost of beam weapons.

Manufacturing beam weapons is as much art as science, requiring highly trained technicians to individually tune each weapon. But if we can standardize this a bit, and even automate portions of it, we should be able to reduce the cost of each unit.
Low Mass Beam Weapons
Reduces mass of beam weapons.

The heaviest parts of beam weapons have always been the charge coils and their associated cooling equipment. But with the latest generation of super-conductors we can now build these smaller and more compact than ever.
Plasma Projection
Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

We're now able to generate collimated plasma containment fields at incredible distances. The upshot to this is that we can now send massive quantities of plasma at relativistic velocities in the direction of anything we don't like very much.
Beam Weapon Mastery
Improves beam weapons.
Our beam weapons are now absurdly powerful, a terror for anyone foolish enough to get on humanity's wrong side. And yet still our weapon scientists find ways to do better.
Master Beam Assembly
Reduces cost of beam weapons.
Our supply chain for the creation of plasma containment fields had a couple of kinks that needed to get worked out, but now that we have, we expect to be able to create beam weapons for far cheaper.
High Density Beam Weapons
Reduces mass of beam weapons.
We're now able to push our beam weapons right up to the energy density limits that physics allow. If we want any more power per unit of mass, we may have to move to a different universe.
Energy Phasing
Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

The phaser particle is almost impossible to understand if you don't have several advanced degrees and possibly an extra brain. In short, these particles can induce a chain reaction that breaks an enemy down into neutrinos, effectively evaporating it.
Doom Ray
Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

An adaptation of the phaser particle emitter has resulted in massive improvements in the induced matter-breakdown reaction. Also of note, our scientists are pretty sure the reaction won't consume the entire universe. So that's good news.
Beam Weapon Augmentation
Allows construction of beam support systems.

We've found that the capacity of our beam energy storage systems can be augmented by an external field, which allows for increased beam output. Such fields could be projected at a distance, improving the beam output of an entire fleet.
High Energy Transfer
Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

After considerable study in the way that beam weapons interact on a subatomic level with both shield systems and hulls, we've developed systems capable of reducing the effectiveness of enemy shields or absorbing enemy beam attacks on our own vessels.
High Energy Magnification
Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

An improved understanding of the effects our beam augmentation fields have has resulted in the possibility of even greater beam outputs. Additionally, we can now build beams that can cripple enemy shields.
Missile Weapons
Allows construction of improved missile weapons.
Conceptually simple, though there's no shame in that, missile-based weapons provide a tremendous amount of punch for their cost.
Missile Optimization
Improves missile weapons.
After blowing up several thousand target drones and one unfortunate asteroid, our weapons engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can implement for our missile platforms.
Rapid Fire Missiles
Increases firing speed of missile weapons.
Our weapons engineers have determined that shooting more missiles at things makes them blow up faster. Which seems obvious in retrospect. Anyways, our missile launchers shoot more now.
Low Cost Missiles
Reduces cost of missile weapons.
Missiles were always going to be the most cost-effective means of making things hurt, and now they're a little bit more so.
Missile Miniaturization
Reduces mass of missile weapons.

Reviews of training data and engagement encounters reveals one overriding request from the field. "We want more missiles. Give us more missiles." Well, having reduced the mass of our launchers and ammunition racks, we're now able to do just that.
Harpoons
Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.
The Harpoon class of missiles employ a number of improvements in speed, range, tracking, and warhead yield, resulting in our most powerful conventional missile system yet.
Warhead Focus
Improves missile weapons.

We've spent comparatively little research time on the warhead components of our missile systems, but now that we've turned our attention to the matter, a number of possible efficiencies should be achievable with a little effort.
Warhead Acceleration
Increases range of missile weapons.

More target drones have given their lives for our glory, and a careful analysis of their deaths has revealed some exciting possibilities in the field of shaped charges, which should improve the destructive yield of our warheads.
Warhead Manufacturing
Reduces cost of missile weapons.

The most delicate part of missile manufacturing was the warhead, for obvious reasons. But the latest generation of ultra-stable explosives should reduce both manufacturing costs and workplace accidents significantly.
Low Mass Warheads
Reduces mass of missile weapons.

By using the latest generation of shaped-charge warheads to reduce the weight of each individual missile, with no corresponding loss of destructive power, we can make room for more missile launchers in total.
Photonic Warheads
Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

By embedding a device in our warheads which releases a high energy burst of photons at the moment of impact, we can achieve substantial penetration against both armor and shield systems, greatly increasing the destructive potential of our warheads.
Payload Mastery
Improves missile weapons.
Various physical limits of this particular universe prevent us from wringing more destructive potential out of this generation of warheads. But we can certainly make them cheaper and lighter.
Master Missile Assembly
Reduces cost of missile weapons.
Our missile manufacturing facilities are now almost perfectly efficient, wasting no material whatsoever. Destruction shouldn't come so cheap, yet here we are.
High Density Warheads
Reduces mass of missile weapons.
A new field based guidance system which uses forcefields to provide final maneuvering capabilities should cut down on the weight of our missiles systems a bit more.
Photon Torpedoes
Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

By matching a wide-spectrum version of the photon-encasement armor piercing technology with our latest anti-matter warheads, we've created a weapon with truly colossal damage potential. They glow a new color too.
Nightmare Torpedoes
Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

The Nightmare torpedo contains a tiny singularity trapped in a pocket universe, which upon being released causes horrifying damage to anything foolish enough to be standing by a place we're firing something called Nightmare Torpedoes at.
Missile Augmentation
Allows construction of missile support systems.
Our weapons researchers have come up with a number of ship and starbase modules which can improve the tracking and ultimately the range of our missiles.
Advanced Missile Guidance
Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

Improved decoy and camouflage systems will greatly increase the survivability of our missiles when faced with point defenses. And our missile support modules now feature a number of predictive systems which should help missile range even more.
Intelligent Warheads
Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

Cluster warheads are capable of specifically targeting and neutralizing enemy point defense systems. And our missile support systems can now make use of information-sharing "pilot" missiles, which allow for more efficient guidance and improved range.
Kinetic Weapons
Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.
There's just something nice and honest about a projectile, isn't there? And thanks to a little help from teams of massive electromagnets, we've now got some extremely fast projectiles to work with.
Kinetic Optimization
Improves kinetic weapons.
Some modest improvements in the energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons could result in improvements to the cost, mass, or range of each unit.
Kinetic Range Extension
Increases range of kinetic weapons.
A switch to slightly smaller projectiles, along with improved energy delivery systems, has led to significant improvements in the speed of each projectile, and thus the effective range of each unit.
Kinetic Weapon Manufacturing
Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

Never before have we needed to make electromagnetic coils in such quantity, and the early days of kinetic weapons were plagued by supply problems. But that's finally been addressed, and we should see cost savings across all of our kinetic weapon programs.
Kinetic Miniaturization
Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

Some experiments with the winding patterns of our electromagnetic coils has revealed a number of subtle synergistic effects which we can take advantage of, leading to tighter, more compact coils, and ultimately, lower mass weapons.
Pulse Cannons
Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

Tight clusters of particles emitted at high velocity gets around some of the practical limitations of slug based mass drivers. These pulse cannons have similar tactical characteristics as previous kinetic weapons. They're just more powerful.
Kinetic Acceleration Focus
Improves kinetic weapons.
Recent advances in superconducting technology should lead to improvements in the critical energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons.
Frictionless Acceleration
Increases range of kinetic weapons.

Our newest superconductors and the steeper energy delivery curves they enable should lead to higher muzzle velocities, at the trade off of smaller projectiles. These weapons should have a longer effective range with no reduction in damage potential.
Low Cost Accelerators
Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

The latest generation of superconducting electromagnetic coils and their less-strenuous cooling requirements make them much less fragile to handle. We expect to see significant cost savings now that we won't break as many during production.
Low Mass Accelerators
Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

Our new ultra-low resistance electromagnets generate a lot more kick per unit weight, leading to lower mass accelerators. We can feel free to cram more of them into whatever we're cramming them in to.
Graviton Thrower
Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

By launching pulses of gravitons we can induce massive shifts in the local gravity of enemy ships that they strike. This will cause incredible amounts of damage, and probably make anyone standing nearby feel really dizzy right before they die.
Kinetic Mastery
Improves kinetic weapons.
After several generations of whipping things at other things as fast as possible, our scientists are now really quite good at it. There remain but a few small efficiencies to wring out of the field.
Master Accelerator Assembly
Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

"We Make Kinetic Weapons Faster," is probably the dumbest slogan ever conceived of, but the factory workers seem really proud of it, so no-one had the heart to tell them. And to be fair, they do make them really quite quickly and cheaply now.
High Density Accelerators
Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.
Our scientists have all but mastered kinetic weapons, having made them as mass efficient as theoretically possible, allowing even our smallest vessels to pack a hellacious punch.
Quantum Drivers
Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

Quantum drivers fire shells that contain small quantum fields which pull in a tremendous amount of mass from a neighboring dimension on impact. We're not sure which dimension. We can only hope that they didn't need that mass.
Singularity Drivers
Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

The pinnacle of kinetic weapon technology, these launch micro singularities that collapse into existence shortly after impact. These are bad news, the worst news really, for anyone who can't get out of the way.
Kinetic Augmentation
Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

Inertial dampening should be impossible in this universe, which is why we were a little surprised we were able to pull it off. We've used this stroke of luck to create systems which can boost the velocity and effective range of our kinetic weapons.
Mass Manipulation
Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

We can now embed inertial modification tech inside projectiles, allowing them to generate ultra-dense outer surfaces for a brief period to improve their armor penetrating capabilities. And our kinetic augmentation systems have gotten a bit better.
Inertial Magnification
Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

Our projectiles are now capable of attacking armor directly, creating low density fissures that can cause the whole structure to splinter. Additionally our kinetic augmentation systems have increased their range boosting effects yet again.
Xeno Combat Techniques
Allows training of soldiers to deal with alien environments.
Planets come in all shapes and sizes. And smells. This technology will begin the process of teaching our soldiers how to deal with alien environments.
Military Specialization
Improves military effectiveness.

Oversight is certainly the least glamorous aspect of keeping a standing army, which is sad considering the benefit it provides. Improving our military administration will result in very real tactical benefits.
Enhanced Training
Improves soldier effectiveness.
Our military's regular training exercises are beginning to pay off, and we can now expect our soldiers to be far more effective when conducting ground-based operations.
Defensive Fortifications
Improves Resistance.

We can't assume that our space-based defenses will always be effective. Our worlds will be significantly more secure if we can harden our ground fortifications and prepare plans to rapidly form colonial militias when they're needed.
Resistance Forces
Increase our colonies ability to resist invaders.
By training our population in basic resistance tactics, we can help them be ready for anything. A prepared population can often be the difference between victory and defeat when invaded.
War College
Allows training of Commanders
Only the best of the best can go to the war college. The end result are an elite breed of leader, the Commander.
Planetary Invasion
Allows transport modules to be constructed.
We've developed the equipment and tactics necessary to land on a world and take it by force. A little hard to imagine it, but we must accept that humans are now the alien invaders.
Invasion Optimization
Unlocks advanced invasion tactics.
Good news! We've developed some new, possibly amoral, certainly effective techniques for pacifying enemy ground forces.
Planetary Bombardment
Allows Planetary Bombardments to be conducted during invasions.
So it turns out that thanks to the properties of mass, the easiest way to pacify something is to just drop something on it. It takes a bit of practice to get right, but the practice is fun itself.
Information Warfare
Allows Informational Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

Information warfare lacks a certain visceral appeal. But EMPs and targeted hacking attacks can cripple an enemy's coordination and limit the effectiveness of their defenses without needing to risk any of our own viscera.
Biological Warfare
Allows Biological Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

Let's be honest. If we're now the alien invaders, there's no reason we have to pretend we're the good guys. Yes we'll have to live with the consequences of using biological weapons. But at least we'll be the ones who live.
Stellar Marines
Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

A greater understanding of the tactics and training required for effective ground-based combat has led to a new form of military unit which specializes in establishing beachheads in unfriendly gravity wells.
Gravitational Focus
Unlocks advanced invasion tactics.

Our ability to manipulate gravitational fields presents several unique tactical possibilities for our ground forces. These are powerful weapons we're giving to guys with pretty thick skulls, so we should definitely remember to keep an eye on them.
Tidal Disruption
Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.
By directing powerful gravitational fields at enemy ground defenses, we can induce flooding and even tectonic activity. The ground shall quake beneath our enemy's feet or feet-analogs.
Core Detonation
Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.
Inducing a planet to suddenly experience massive, worldwide volcanic activity is a pretty extreme step. That said, it certainly will pacify any hostiles. Also liquefy them.
Drone Soldiers
Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.
There are massive benefits in unit reliability and coordination if our troops are programmed to unfailingly do what we tell them to. And we won't have to feel so bad about losing these ones.
Advanced Invasion Tactics
Improves soldier effectiveness and allows construction of advanced transports.
A new generation of invasion transports, along with a new generation of soldiers that don't mind being stacked like firewood, allows us to put boots on the ground faster than ever.
Fortification
Allows construction of defensive fortifications, and improves Resistance.
We mustn't neglect our own defenses, and with the latest generation of defensive fortifications, our planets and starbases will be able to put up a much tougher fight.
Defensive Focus
Unlocks advanced invasion defenses.
Our military theoreticians have analyzed reports of the latest invasion tactics in use in the galaxy and come up with a number of elegant ways to counter them.
Bombardment Shelters
Makes all colonies Immune to Planetary Bombardment.
By moving our most critical structures underground, and providing similar shelters for civilians and troops, we can dramatically limit the effectiveness of most forms of orbital bombardment.
Information Systems Hardening
Makes all colonies Immune to Information Warfare.
Our defensive experts have identified a number of vulnerabilities in our ground-based CandC systems, and urgently recommend that we harden them.
Adaptive Vaccinations
Makes all colonies Immune to Biological Warfare.

It's impossible to conventionally vaccinate against an unknown biological attack. Adaptive vaccines are engineered lifeforms that lie dormant, ready to rapidly assist a immune system to fight new infections the moment they appear.
Orbital Defense Platform
Adds defensive fighters to orbit, improves resistance.
A dedicated orbital defense platform will provide an additional layer of defense for our planetary systems, and take some of the defensive responsibility off of our starbases.
Planetary Defense Dome
Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves resistance.

With the resources and energy available to ground-based structures, we're now able to construct a shielded dome with so many layers of redundancy that it's effectively invulnerable to any orbital bombardment.
Defense Systems
Allows construction of basic defensive systems.
Naval crews are notoriously squishy, and otherwise difficult to protect in a ship that operates in hard vacuum. But we've got to do something, or they're going to stop getting in the ships.
Defensive Specialization
Improves defensive systems.
After studying the wreckage of a few vessels we've lost in combat, our engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can make to our defensive technologies.
Shield Specialization
Reduces cost of shields.

Deflecting or diffusing incoming weapon fire is really, really hard, and we're far from having a really good understanding of it. Our latest round of research has only succeeded in making existing shield systems a bit cheaper to build.
Point Defense Specialization
Reduces cost of point defenses.
Making our point defenses fire more crap into the space around the ship is a simple solution to a complicated question. Though still a surprisingly effective one.
Armor Specialization
Reduces mass of armor.

By adjusting the size and positioning of our armor panels, we've been able to minimize overlap and other inefficiencies, and can now provide the same level of protection to our ships for less overall weight.
Shield Systems
Allows construction of improved shield systems.

No longer must our ships cower behind crude deflector fields. The latest generation of shields, although expensive, are capable of stopping incoming attacks outright, rather than just deflecting or diffusing their impact.
Shield Optimization
Improves shield systems.
We've received quite a bit of useful data on real world performance of our shield systems, and have devised several possible improvements we can begin making to them.
Shield Enhancement
Increases shield strength.
Of all the suggestions we've received from the field on how to improve our shield systems, "Please make them bigger," seemed to be the most popular. So we've done that.
Low Cost Shield Systems
Reduces shield cost.
We probably shouldn't talk in front of the troops about our efforts to make our shield systems cheaper, even if it means more shields to go around for everyone. Because that's not how they'll see it.
Shield Miniaturization
Reduces shield mass.
The first few generation of field emitters used in our shield systems were incredibly bulky and cumbersome. And they still are, frankly. Just a bit less so now.
Barrier Field Generation
Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

The latest generation of shields, the so-called Barrier Field, is capable of absorbing a portion of the energy which strikes it. This dramatically increases the energy efficiency of the system, allowing for ultimately much more powerful shields.
Barrier System Focus
Improves shield systems.
A careful design review of our initial implementation of the Barrier Field system has revealed a number of possible avenues for further improvements. Who says design reviews are unexciting?
High Output Shield Generators
Increases shield strength.

The first generation of energy absorbers in our Barrier Field systems used a model of capacitor which occasionally exploded violently. Crews had decidedly mixed feelings about this, so we replaced those capacitors with a slightly more robust model.
Low Cost Shield Generators
Reduces shield cost.
Since the first few shield emitters went out the door, we've slowly been able to achieve some economies of scale in the manufacture of these systems, reducing the cost of all future installations.
Low Mass Shield Generators
Reduces shield mass.
We've recently been able to shave a ton of weight off of our shield generators thanks to the latest generation of superconductors and their less extensive cooling requirements.
Force Fields
Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

The latest generation of shields are capable of directing vast amounts of additional energy to a specific section of shields within nanoseconds of the moment of impact, allowing for shields which are much stronger relative to their respective weight.
Shield Mastery
Improves shield systems.
Our shielding technology approaches perfection, our engineers pushing the capabilities of our shield systems right to their theoretical limits.
Master Shield Assembly
Reduces shield cost.
Cheaper shields never meant less effective shields, and it's only taken a few decades for our crews to finally understand that. Which is good, because our shields are spectacularly cheap now.
High Density Shield Generators
Reduces shield mass.
It's impossible to make the energy emitters of our shields any denser our engineers claim. They claim that kind of thing a lot and always take it back later, but they seem pretty sure this time.
Invulnerability
Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

"Invulnerable" may be a bit of an exaggeration. Our researchers allow that some theoretical weapons could penetrate these shields. But those would be some pretty terrifying weapons, and even then you'd rather be behind this shield than not.
Shield Support Systems
Allows construction of shield support systems.

Advances in the focusing capabilities of our shield generators has given us the ability to generate and augment the shields of friendly ships. This should provide massive tactical and strategic options for fleet operations.
Shield Augmentation
Allows construction of improved shield support systems.
The same technology we've used to generate shields at a distance can now be done with our Barrier Field systems, allowing for even greater improvements in fleet survivability.
Energy Field Manipulation
Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

Our mastery of the energy fields needed to create and maintain shields has resulted in a couple interesting new technologies, capable of interfering with enemy shield systems, or massively shielding friendly units within range.
Point Defenses
Allows construction of point defense systems.

Arrays of tiny computer controlled railguns that track and destroy incoming missiles are unparalleled at protecting ships and starbases from missile attacks, though they still aren't terribly helpful at defending against other classes of weapons.
Point Defense Optimization
Improves point defense systems.
Optimizing our point defense systems should lead to a number of different performance gains. Like possibly less exploded ships.
Smart Point Defenses
Increases point defense strength.
A careful analysis of various missile performance envelopes has led us to adjust the firing patterns of our point defense systems, making them a bit more effective.
Low Cost Point Defenses
Reduces point defense cost.

The sensor equipment our point defense systems use is fairly specialized equipment that was initially quite rare and costly. Now that we're building a lot of point defenses, the price of those systems is starting to come down.
Point Defense Miniaturization
Reduces point defense mass.

The slugs fired by point defenses don't need to be large, and were limited by the fact that we couldn't build railguns any smaller. But now that we can build more compact units, we should see significant weight savings for all our point defense systems.
Counter Measures
Allows construction of advanced point defense systems.

By deploying electronic counter measures which interfere with and confuse incoming missile attacks, we've greatly increased the survivability of our ships and starbases. Against missiles at least. Still hard to confuse a laser.
Counter Measure Focus
Improves point defense systems.
Now that we have some field data on ECM suite performance, we've identified a number of different ways we can improve upon the design and construction of those systems.
Adaptive Counter Measures
Increases point defense strength.
There's always a generational game of leap frog being played between missile designers and ECM designers, but we believe our latest algorithms have given us the leg up on the bad guys this time.
Counter Measure Manufacturing
Reduces point defense cost.
