Our earliest attempts at ECM suites were heavily customizable, requiring a great deal of hand tuning to make them perform at their best. Now that we know what works, we can automate much more of the manufacturing and installation process.
Low Mass Counter Measures
Reduces point defense mass.
Our first ECM suites were cobbled together from a half dozen different processors and transmitters. We've since streamlined those into a single unit which weighs much less.
Drone Sentry Systems
Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.
By installing our point defense systems on drone platforms that orbit our ships at a distance, we can add a valuable extra layer of protection against missile attacks.
Drone System Mastery
Improves point defense systems.
Drone systems dramatically increased the sheer volume of our point defense capabilities, so any small improvement in their design should lead to significant cost or weight savings.
Master Point Defense Assembly
Reduces point defense cost.

To be fair, only a few of our drone systems have ever actually shot each other in combat situations. But by minimizing that just a little bit more, we should be able to make our point defenses a little more cost-effective, if a bit less funny.
High Density Point Defenses
Reduces point defense mass.
Once we realized point defense drones don't need much personal space, we were able to start packing them in a lot tighter.
Aereon Missile Defense
Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

The ultimate in point defense technology, featuring the latest generation of micro-drones armed with railguns, ECM and smart chafe. Aereon systems fill the space around a ship with a cloud of debris so thick no enemy missiles are likely to survive.
Point Defense Support
Allows construction of point defense support systems.
Our experience working with small scale point defenses has led to a type of long range missile tracking system which should enhance the point defense capabilities of an entire fleet.
Point Defense Augmentation
Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.
Wide area missile disruptors enhance the effectiveness of our existing counter measures, adding a much needed layer of extra missile security to our fleets.
Point Defense Manipulation
Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

Fleet-wide drone systems will provide massive missile security to an entire fleet. Additionally we can now equip point defense disruptors, essentially a type of counter-counter-measure, which should boost the effectiveness of our own missile attacks.
Armor Systems
Allows construction of improved armor systems.
A big lump of ultra-dense material remains an effective, if unsubtle, method of protection from modern space-based weaponry. Subtlety is overrated though.
Armor Optimization
Improves armor systems.
We've blown up lots and lots of slabs of armor on the test range, and have come up with a few possible improvements we could make to our armor systems.
Reinforced Armor
Increases armor strength.

A simple mistake by one of our fabricators resulted in a set of armor panels marginally denser and more resilient than we'd seen before. It took us a long time to replicate that mistake, but now that we have, our ships should be a little tougher to kill.
Low-Cost Armor
Reduces armor cost.

One of the biggest challenges with armor manufacturing was simply the logistics of moving rare and heavy resources and materials around. Now that we've got our supply chain sorted out, we can expect to see some nice cost savings.
Armor Miniaturization
Reduces armor mass.

By its very nature, armor is always going to be a fairly mass-intensive means of protection. That said, we can do a few things to improve the precision and fit of armor plating, which should cut down on weight a bit.
Durantium Composite
Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

Certain materials, when stacked in specific arrangements have a synergistic effect on the strength of their neighbors under compressive forces. We call these new composites Durantium, and they should tremendously increase the survivability of our ships.
Armor Focus
Improves armor systems.

Our armor systems have increased significantly in complexity, and our efforts to model their behavior under impact is only now catching up. This research should help lead to more effective or efficient designs.
Armor Lamination
Increases armor strength.

A careful study of battle-damaged ships has revealed previously unknown weaknesses in our armor systems. Basically, we know why some of them were cracking in half now. We'll do something about that right away.
Armor Manufacturing Focus
Reduces armor cost.
If our crews ask, it's not that our armor is cheap. It's that we've found a more efficient way of manufacturing it. But yes, it is pretty cheap.
Armor Mass Reduction
Reduces armor mass.
Some experiments with the arrangement of our Durantium composites has revealed that we can get away with slightly less dense materials at certain layers with no impact to the armor's effectiveness.
Kanvium Laminate
Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

Kanvium armor uses a new type of lamination which causes surrounding materials to partially fluidize on impact, deforming in a recoverable way. Impacts are spread out over a much larger area, then flow back into its original shape.
Armor Mastery
Improves armor systems.

Our mastery of hardening techniques is almost complete, and the galaxy trembles at the girth of our vessels. But even perfection can be improved upon it seems. Some more effort should lead to cheaper or more efficient armor systems.
Master Armorers
Reduces armor cost.

With modern armoring systems, the design of the armor informs the shape of the ship as much as the other way around. Properly armoring a ship involves a complicated series of trade offs, which when we get right, mean ships protected for much cheaper.
High Density Armor
Reduces armor mass.

On a weight basis, our armor systems are now as efficient as they can possibly be, 99.3% of all total installed mass dedicated to offensive energy absorption or dispersion. That's really, really good the researchers promise.
Zero Point Armor
Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

We have a hard time proving zero point armor even exists, only knowing of it by the effect it has. It appears to tap into the zero-point energy of the quantum vacuum to repulse incoming energy. It's almost impossibly tough, we can prove that much.
Armor Support Systems
Allows construction of armor support systems.

In the factory, we've begun producing armor plating with a variety of force field based technologies. By adapting these fields into ship modules, we can create a hardening effect at a distance, making every ship in a fleet substantially more durable.
Armor Enhancement
Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

The fields that we use to generate hardening effects have twenty seven different "poles" which can be cycled through, changing the alignment of the hardening effects in the affected material, generating substantially stronger, more resilient materials.
Integrity Field Projection
Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

Our latest generation of armoring fields no longer just generate hardening effects at a distance, but can induce material fluidization and shape recovery. These new Integrity Fields can make our fleets invulnerable to all but the most powerful attacks.
Culture
Allows research of technologies that involves communicating with other beings.
We've already seen glimpses of evidence that we're not alone in this galaxy. Which presents an incredible danger, but also, perhaps, an opportunity. But also, let's stress again, danger.
Universal Translator
Can begin communicating with aliens. Boosts diplomacy.
Intense study of the fragments of alien text and speech has allowed us to create a Universal Translator that will let us communicate with any new races we come across.
Diplomatic Specialization
Improves diplomatic effects.

The words we use have a limited ability to affect the way we think, and by studying the vocabulary used by our neighbors, we may unlock valuable insights into their mindsets. And possibly even find out how to manipulate them.
Diplomatic Reasoning
Increases Diplomacy.

We've begun simulating different rhetorical and diplomatic approaches when dealing with aliens, revealing several ways we might improve their attitudes towards us. Our role-playing has enabled us to talk prettier, essentially.
Influential Voice
Increases Influence.

Our culture has a way of communicating what our diplomats cannot. By increasing the ease with which other civilizations can access our culture we can win hearts and minds before we even get to the negotiating table.
Efficient Administrators
Interstellar Governance

Governing a civilization on this scale parallels our experience exploring our own world hundreds of years ago. A history we'd better refamiliarize ourselves with quickly, before we get any space tea dumped in our harbors.
Political Specialization

There are several broad ways to organize the government of a space faring civilization, all of which pose distinct advantages and disadvantages. Rest assured, there's no right choice here; regardless of what we pick, everyone will tell us that we made the wrong choice.
Federalist Party

Federalist parties advocate a relatively weak central government that offloads much of its responsibility to lower, more local governmental groups. This bias towards local regulation seems to encourage economic development.
Populist Party

Populist forms of government are designed to make people happy, even at the cost of economic strength. As a side-effect of this relentless interest in pleasing others, Populist governments are often very good at diplomacy.
Universalist Party

Universalist governments attempt to be all things to all people. That can be a lot of people, none of whom ever seem to agree on anything, but a balanced approach like this at least ensures a government has no weak spots.
Galactic Governance

By granting limited powers of self rule to various elements of society, reserving the most critical functions for our own central government, we expect to see increased public satisfaction and all the benefits which come with it.
Political Focus

As we continue to manage, and often mis-manage, our affairs, it's become clear that a number of political theories we'd never previously considered viable might actually be very practical when practiced on a galactic scale.
Industrialist Party

Industrialist governments seek to maximize industrial capacity by rewarding citizens based entirely on their productivity. From top to bottom, society is organized to encourage hard work and not having fun.
Mercantile Party
Mercantilists seek to ensure their civilization's prosperity through trade, via careful negotiations, brutally unfair tariff, and outright espionage.
Technologist Party

Any time two civilizations have met the less technologically advanced one has come out worse from the encounter. Technologists dedicate all governmental resources to ensure that they never become that dumber civilization.
Interstellar Democracy

A system which lets people pick their own rulers, or at least think they're picking their own rulers, has obvious merits in terms of approval and productivity, although adapting it to a civilization this big has proven challenging.
Political Mastery

Coordinating the direction of an entire galactic civilization is tremendously difficult. But thanks to advances in deceit and brain injection technology, we can now put this whole show entirely on a war footing, or, if we choose, the exact opposite.
War Party

Whether it's because they consider all other civilizations to be inferior, or simply terrifying, members of the War Party are willing to put their entire civilization on a military footing to do something about it.
Pacifist Party

Pacifist governments forego the language of aggression and militarization and focus all their efforts on promoting culture and social welfare. This makes them well liked in the galactic community, and their words travel far.
Star Federation
The ultimate in space based governance, an ideal blend of all the freedoms, responsibilities, and delicious seasonings which make up an ideal civic life.
Diplomacy
Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

The profit potential an alliance with our neighbors offers is something we should always consider. And failing that, the cost of talking with them will be a fraction of the cost of going to war with then.
Diplomatic Optimization
Unlocks advanced treaties.
Depending on the current state of our civilization, we profit more from some types of treaties than others, and should begin slanting our diplomatic posture in those directions right away.
Economic Treaty
Allows formation of economic treaties.
Economic treaties will lower tariffs and other obstacles that discourage business activities. When well designed, these treaties should result in increased wealth for both parties.
Cultural Treaty
Allows formation of cultural treaties.
By increasing the interchange of cultural products and making it easier for civilians to cross borders, we can hope to increase the influence we have on our neighbors.
Research Treaty
Allows formation of research treaties.
By entering into formal information sharing agreements with other civilizations, our researchers can more easily accumulate the masses of data which modern research often requires.
Interstellar Alliances
Allows construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

Turning a friendly species into a formal ally is a supremely delicate process. There's only one way these talks can go right, and a thousand ways they can go wrong. The etiquette of alien handshakes alone is fraught with peril.
Alliance Focus
Unlocks advanced alliances.

Alliances come in a variety of flavors, some of which may be more advantageous to us than others. We should consider our civilization's priorities - and what our new ally is actually good for - before entering such talks.
Military Alliance
Allows formation of military alliances.

Formal military alliances will make a war with humanity that much more imposing to our foes. The trade-off is that we risk being drawn into wars not of our choosing. Friends are cheap to have, but allies can be very expensive indeed.
Technological Alliance
Allows formation of technological alliances.

A technological alliance will dramatically ramp up the research sharing programs we have with our ally. This is valuable information, so we must be sure of their friendship before entering such an agreement.
Cultural Alliance
Allows formation of cultural alliances.

A formal cultural alliance will lower almost all barriers to the movement of people and ideas across borders with our neighbor. Not only will this bring us closer, we can hope to have a bigger influence on our neighbor's culture.
Eminence
Allows construction of advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

A civilization which takes diplomacy seriously and has a long record of fair-minded dealing will always carry a greater voice at the bargaining table. Our people are building that reputation now, and are stronger for it.
Majesty
Allows formation of assimilation treaties.

The galaxy wants to believe every word we say. So sterling is our reputation, that our diplomats often find whole worlds begging to join our culture. The pen hasn't just beaten the sword; it's humiliated it.
Espionage
Allows for the training of Agents that can be used to destabilize and surveille other Races.

Some of our more conniving Researchers have been able to put together a training program for the training of Espionage Agents. If we are willing to build some training centers for these Agents we should soon be able to keep a better eye on what other races are up to, and even make things a bit more difficult for them if we don't like it.
Espionage Specialization
Improves cultural buildings.

Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.
Free Agent
All Spies gain one additional level
All Spies gain one additional level
Agent Training
Increase the rate our Agents can be trained.
Increase the rate our Agents can be trained.
Espionage Support
Increase the rate our Agents Level Up.
Increase the rate our Agents Level Up.
Advanced Destabilization
Allows for the Training of Higher Level Agents.

Enough of our Agents have now survived there tours of dutie, to come back to our worlds with tips and tricks for the next genration. These new instuctors are able to perpare our new agents for the missions much more efficantly.
Espionage Optimization
Improves cultural buildings.

Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.
Optimized Training
Increase the rate our Agents can be trained.
Increase the rate our Agents can be trained.
Optimized Agents
Increases the level of all your current agents by 1.
Increases the level of all your current agents by 1.
Interstellar Surveillance
Allows for the training of Agents that can be used to destabilize and surveille other Races.

Some of our more conniving Researchers have been able to put together a training program for the training of Espionage Agents. If we are willing to build some training centers for these Agents we should soon be able to keep a better eye on what other races are up to, and even make things a bit more difficult for them if we don't like it.
Espionage Focus
Improves cultural buildings.

Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.
Agent Training Focus
Increase the rate our Agents can be trained.
Increase the rate our Agents can be trained.
Espionage Breakthrough
Steal one random tech from a random race your are surveilling
Steal one random tech from a random race your are surveilling
Espionage Masters
Allows for the training of Agents that can be used to destabilize and surveille other Races.

Some of our more conniving Researchers have been able to put together a training program for the training of Espionage Agents. If we are willing to build some training centers for these Agents we should soon be able to keep a better eye on what other races are up to, and even make things a bit more difficult for them if we don't like it.
Cultural Influence
Allows construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

A strong cultural presence, on our worlds and our neighbors' has tremendous long term potential. It lacks some of the visceral appeal of a new type of mass driver, but may in the long run be far more effective at securing humanity's future.
Cultural Optimization
Improves cultural buildings.

Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.
Passionate Representation
Increases Influence.

Now that our culture has made inroads on the planets of our neighbors, we can help cement this influence by encouraging our biggest stars to regularly visit and vacation there, serving as ambassadors for our way of life.
Efficient Representation
Reduces cost of cultural buildings.

Although artists and designers aren't naturally inclined towards thinking about money, after we locked a few of them in a room with an accountant for a bit, they managed to find a number of ways they could do their work more efficiently.
Self Sufficient Representation
Reduces maintenance costs of cultural buildings.

Our cultural facilities cost real money to maintain. By encouraging our artists and directors to reuse materials, props, and punch lines whenever possible, we can reduce the ongoing costs of running these enterprises.
Cultural Outreach
Allows construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

By building facilities that focus on spreading our cultural accomplishments amongst our civilians and neighbors, we expect to see even more influence in this region of space, or at the very least, more awards from the artistic community.
Cultural Focus
Increases influence on specific worlds.

Few works of art and cultural artifacts have broad appeal, and it's often necessary to target one's audience to some extent. By fine tuning the tone and content of our cultural products, we might appeal to demographics which are particularly valuable to us.
Research-Focused Culture
Increases Influence on research planets.
By adapting our cultural products to cast scientists and researchers in a more favorable light, we might find appreciative audiences among research communities.
Approval-Focused Culture
Increases Influence on planets with high approval.

A culture which focuses on its leaders is a fine thing to have when those leaders are doing a good job. When the leaders aren't doing a good job, it's filled with harsh satire and unflattering impressions, so watch out for that.
Wealth-Focused Culture
Increases Influence on wealthy planets.

If people have money, let's not make them ashamed of it. By encouraging displays of conspicuous consumption and a culture which celebrates wealth, we can gain a great deal of influence with people living the good life.
Stellar Emigration
Allows construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.
Humans are admired throughout the galaxy, reflecting the success of our civilization. If we can make the process of emigration easier, we can spread our influence wider still.
Cultural Assimilation
Allows construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

Foreign cultures have such backwards ideas that we'll find great value in quickly assimilating and removing the cultural trappings of new arrivals. By doing so can increase the penetration and acceptance of our culture more still.
Cultural Domination
Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.
There is no other culture in the galaxy but ours, and anyone who claims otherwise is a heretic. Or just dumb. All sane beings will soon bow down before our celebrities and thinkers.
Cultural Affinity
Prepares civilization for Ascension.

Other universes deserve the benefit of humanity's wisdom and culture. Indeed, it's a bit offensive that they don't see it already. Our thinkers are now beginning to prepare plans for shining our light on the next world, and beyond.
Commerce Specialization
Increases economic benefits.
With a bit of experience managing and regulating markets on a massive scale, we're now able to target specific economic improvements we might like to see.
Wealthy Population
Increases wealth.

With targeted tax rates, we can encourage a number of different areas of our economy. A tax policy which favors business and investment should ultimately lead to a wealthier economy for example. Unless the businesses and investors were lying to us.
Supportive Population
Increases approval.
By targeting economic policy to support workers and the civilian population in general, we can ensure we have a much broader base of approval to build our civilization on.
Designated Trading Partner
Adds trade route.
Encouraging and supporting trade is a great way to both bring in extra income and forge closer ties with our neighbors. Everyone's happy when they're making money.
Xeno Economics
Allows construction of improved economic buildings.

The sheer distance between buyers and sellers in this economy has resulted in us having to rewrite a number of different theories of economics. At minimum, some new banking and economic structures will be required to deal with all the complications.
Interstellar Banking
Allows construction of advanced economic buildings.
Capital can now be transferred instantaneously. This has allowed a variety of creative arbitrage opportunities, which will require new regulations and banking theory to contain.
Economic Focus
Increases income.

Now that we have a better understanding of the quirks of galactic scale economies, we can begin trimming back the regulations and policies that seem to be causing inefficiencies in specific industries and areas.
Trade Economy
Increases trade route income.
An economy which prioritizes external trading will be well suited to exploit the wealth of the greater galactic community, or just exploit the greater galactic community in general.
Well Crafted Treaties
Increases Diplomatic trade income
There is a certain art in the framing of a treaty, and even in an agreement between equals, one party can be more equal than the other. Let's be that more equal party.
Tourism Board
Increases tourism income.
By reducing the obstacles that foreign tourists might face when trying to visit us, we can encourage more of them to travel here and more of their money to stay here.
Financial Sectors
Allows construction of exotic economic buildings.

Dedicated financial sectors should help facilitate the flow of capital across our civilization, which will result in more things being built in the places they need to. Wealth creation, in other words, which we can tap for a variety of purposes.
Galactic Stock Market
Allows construction of the ultimate economic buildings.
Stock exchanges have proven remarkably elusive to establish in this galaxy, and only the most recent advances in communications technology and regulatory capability have made them possible.
Interstellar Trade
Allows construction of basic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.
Exchanging goods with our neighbors will theoretically enrich us both, and is worth pursuing for that reason alone. Also, if we play it smart, it can enrich us a lot more than the other guy.
Trade Optimization
Increases trade income.
Trading is as much an art as a science, but by inducing our traders to use just a smidge more science, they might be able to maximize their profits when dealing with certain counterparties.
Trade Route Optimization
Increases overall value of trade routes
By optimizing both the outgoing and receiving ends of our trade routes we have been able to achieve a modest overall profit for everyone involved.
Expanded Trade
Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.
We believe the best way to increase trade income is the establish more trade routes. With a bit of effort we have been able to stretch our recourses enough to establish one more.
Galactic Trade
Allows construction of improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.
By establishing fixed trading hubs and encouraging the markets which develop around them, the wealth of the entire galactic community will flow through our hands. Our ever so slightly sticky hands.
Trade Focus
Unlocks advanced trade routes.
Now that we have a reputation as fair dealers and market makers, it should be possible to target our trading activities to encourage specific economic sectors.
Trade Tariffs
Increases overall value of trade routes
By establishing a trade tariffs on our colonies we have been able to increase our trade route profits substantially.
Trade Route Focus
Allows the establishment of one additional trade route
More trade routes, more trade income, who no need for Tariffs, or 'Luxury items', Some times its best to stick to the basics.
Galactic Facilitation
Allows construction of advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

The sheer volume of goods that pass through a trading port is staggering, and we'll need new facilities to manage the flow of goods smoothly. And safely. We've had a few too many large masses make dock workers very, very flat.
Trade Masters
Allows construction of exotic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

Our civilization is synonymous with wealth and trading, and all intelligent beings know our markets are the only viable place to show their goods. And of course certain advantages accrue to the owners of such a monopoly.
Xeno Entertainment
Allows construction of basic entertainment buildings. Increases Approval.

Without the approval of our people, we won't be able to accomplish very much. Distracting them with various amusements is perhaps a cynical ploy, but it might be easier than trying to treat them as the rational beings they're so often not.
Population Diversion
Allows construction of advanced entertainment buildings.
More amusements! Bigger amusements! Human beings are dreadfully simple sometimes, which is distressing on some level, even if it does make them pretty easy to manage.
Approval Focus
Increases approval on specific planets.

Our cultural engineers inform us that some well planned manipulations of our cultural materials could make our people happier with what they already have. Which seems too good of an opportunity to pass up.
Easy to Please
Increase the morale of your colonies.
We have discovered that we can make people feel more confident and happy. With proper messaging, we can keep our citizens happy without all that costly infrastructure.
Easily Distracted
Makes building Entertainment Improvements much cheaper.
We have discovered that our efforts in keeping our people distracted have paid off. We can now build anything, and they will think it is fun.
Eager to Please
Greatly reduces the Maintenance required by Entertainment Improvements.
Not only are our people easier to please, they will now do most of the work it takes to distract themselves, for free.
Superior Recreation
Allows construction of exotic entertainment buildings.

Zero gravity beaches are a tough concept to wrap your head around, and even tougher to build. But that hasn't stopped them from becoming insanely popular, even if they do get in the hair and teeth a lot more than the regular kind.
Contentment
Allows construction of the ultimate entertainment buildings.

It turns out the answer we were looking for this whole time was simply injecting happiness into the base of the skull. Virtual worlds offer anything a person could desire at a fraction of the cost of actually giving it to them.
Interstellar Tourism
Allows construction of improved entertainment buildings. Begin collecting tourism income.

Not only can we distract our own citizens with amusements, we can begin luring friendly visitors from our galactic neighbors. This will not only help improve relations, it should result in extra income for us.
Galactic Cruise Lines
Allows construction of tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

Space is, for people not involved with day to day civilization building, incredibly boring. And it's still a bit deadly. But if we were to spruce it up a bit, there might be some profit in sending tourists there.
Wonders of the Galaxy
Allows construction of advanced tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

The galactic community is beginning to realize just how awesome humanity is, and if they aren't, we'll soon be airing targeted advertisements which tell them to. The increased tourism revenue is anticipated to be a nice bonus.
Pilgrimage
Allows construction of exotic tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

There's not a single being in this galaxy that doesn't want to make a visit to human space. For many of them, it's a religious requirement. Our home has become the most important destination that intelligent life has ever known.
Black Market
Lets us build a Black Market.
Despite our best efforts, the slavelings often come into possession of various bits of money. By giving them a place to trade, we can boost their productivity, improving manufacturing and research.
Fighting Pits
Lets us build Fighting Pits.

There are few things more relaxing than watching two other creatures fight each other to the death, or even just to the 'really badly hurt.' Our new fighting pits should boost Approval everywhere they're built.
Tournaments
Lets us build an Arena.

By organizing our regional fighting pits into tournament brackets, and inviting the best and most depraved fighters from other nearby worlds, we can ensure that the Arena is a fun time for the entire family.
Saughtertorium
Lets us build a Slaughtertorium.

A slaughtertorium will serve as more than a means to amuse the local populace, but also attract tourists from around the galaxy who might be interested in seeing what the insides of various creatures look like.
Approval Focus
Forces various planets to be happier.
Our regular program of inspirational beatings is no longer capable of delivering the approval benefits we need. We should begin targeting our inspiration more carefully.
Easy to Please
Increase the morale of your colonies.
We have discovered that we can make people feel more confident and happy. With proper messaging, we can keep our citizens happy without all that costly infrastructure.
Easily Distracted
Makes building Entertainment Improvements much cheaper.
We have discovered that our efforts in keeping our people distracted have paid off. We can now build anything, and they will think it is fun.
Eager to Please
Greatly reduces the Maintenance required by Entertainment Improvements.
Not only are our people easier to please, they will now do most of the work it takes to distract themselves, for free.
Hunting Grounds
Lets us build Hunting Grounds.
Hunting Grounds will give particularly wealthy individuals the opportunity to hunt and kill some of the most beautiful and delicate animals from around the galaxy.
Xeno Mysticism
Allows construction of the Social Matrix.
The Social Matrix provides a place for all Altarians to interact with and judge their peers, increasing productivity in both manufacturing and research sectors.
Precursor History
Let the wisdom of the Precursors improve our society.
By better understanding the history of the Precusors, we can begin taking steps to make our race even greater than it already is.
Way of the Arnor
Increases Research and Influence.
Our appreciation of the wisdom and intelligence of our Arnor precursors will give every planet in our civilization a boost to its research efforts, and make it more influential amongst its neighbors.
Way of the Dread Lords
Boost military production and soldiering

Our appreciation of the strength of will possessed by the Dread Lords, gives every planet in our civilization a boost to its military production capacity, and makes all of our soldiers more effective.
Dark Energy Research
Allows construction of the Dark Energy Lab.
The Dark Energy Lab uses the secret energy source of the Precursors to provide a massive bonus to research and production on a planet.
Inherent Talent
Increases accuracy and interferes with enemy targeting.

We've been able to develop control systems which take advantage of Altarians' natural gifts for rapid thinking and positioning, which should greatly improve the effectiveness of our targeting and counter measure systems.
Defensive Meditation
Allows construction of the Champion's Temple.
The Champion's Temple trains Altarians the intricacies of various martial techniques, and the reason why even an enlightened species must sometimes use force to defend the weak.
Precursor Antiquities
Allows the construction of the Precursor Reliquary.
So wealthy are we with the wisdom of the Precursors, that we're able to sell smaller relics to tourists and other enlightenment seekers, providing a very valuable source of tourism income.
Collective Manufacturing
Allows construction of improved colony buildings.
Bringing order to new worlds is a challenge, as they are often plagued by existing biological detritus. This filth must be destroyed, but it often tries to run away. It is frustrating.
Industrial Specialization
Iterative design processes will make our colonial buildings better, in the same way they make all things better.
Manufacturing Specialization
Improves manufacturing capacity.
We should make things faster. We will adjust the bodies of the Yor who make things, to give them the limbs they need to make things faster.
Research Specialization
Improves research capacity.
We should research faster. We will augment the Minds of our creative Yor to give them more raw calculating power.
Industrial Specialization
Reduces the cost of building manufacturing and research centers.
The Yor who manufacture and the Yor who research require specialized limbs and brains. We will make those limbs and brains more efficiently.
Industrial Mechanization
Allows construction of advanced manufacturing facilities.
The creative Yor have created new iterations of manufacturing limbs. When installed on the manufacturing Yor, output will be improved.
Construction Optimization
We are always reviewing internal operations. We are always finding improvements to make. It's what makes us superior to the meat minds.
Manufacturing Network
Increase the Adjacency bonuses of Manufacturing Improvements
All Yor benefit from networking and load-sharing algorithms, including manufacturing Yor. We will change our operation protocols to increase the networking effect of adjacent manufacturing clusters.
Efficient Mechanization
Reduces manufacturing cost.

A revised manufacturing limb protocol allows those limbs to accommodate a wider range of inputs and outputs. We can now manufacture a wider range of objects with the same limbs, for a lower total cost.
Sustainable Mechanization
Reduces maintenance costs of manufacturing plants.
Our manufacturing limbs require maintenance to function. A new iteration of limbs with increased support for user-maintainability will reduce the maintenance costs of our manufacturing centers.
Precision Manufacturing
Allows construction of exotic manufacturing facilities.
The manufacturing Yor and their limbs have became so large that they are often mistaken for buildings. Materials go in one side and come out the other as valuable assets.
Manufacturing Focus
The meat species would tremble and jiggle if they understood how great our production capacity. We should make it larger. We should make them jiggle harder.
Military Industry
Improves military manufacturing capacity.

All Yor have opinions. Some of our manufacturing Yor have Militant opinions. We will focus their energies on military manufacturing, to make them happier and increase our military manufacturing capacity.
Social Industry
Improves civilian manufacturing capacity.
We must keep the Yor healthy and content and productive. We will design infrastructure to do this and create limbs better suited for manufacturing this infrastructure.
Synchronized Manufacturing
Reduces manufacturing costs.

By focusing on the Networking of our Manufacturing Yor, we they have been able to Synchronize their functionality so well that each planets manufacturing behaves almost like one being. As a result our ability to create new projects, and maintain them has become much cheaper.
Manufacturing Matrix
Allows construction of the ultimate manufacturing facilities.

Our Research Yor have mastered the design of Manufacturing Yor, they are now so near 100% efficiency that further optimization is impractical. The only remaining advancements are merely specializations of output Type.
Industrial Mastery
Improves manufacturing buildings.
Our manufacturing buildings are the best. The best is not perfect. We will make them better.
Master Military Assembly
Improves military manufacturing capacity.
Our Manufacturing Yor are now the most advanced in the galaxy, all that remains is to allow them to focus on creating the tools needed to mold the rest of it to the needs of the Yor.
Planetary Construction Mastery
Improves social manufacturing capacity.
We can now Mold Planets to our will in record time, our manufacturing Yor. Soon the entire galaxy will be part of the Yor, and the True Singularity will come.
Power Matrix
Alows for the constuction of Power Matrix
The key to Yor growth has always been Power, to Propagate our Race, , build our ships, or to advance technology, power always needed.
Power Specialization
Improves power plants.
Power plants are the foundation upon which we will build everything. We will improve them to target the colonial sectors that we calculate provide us the most benefit.
Manufacturing Capacity
Optimizes power plants to boost Manufacturing Improvements
By focusing our power distribution to Manufacturing Facilities we are able to boost the efficiency of all our colonies.
Technological Capacity
Optimizes power plants to boost Research Improvements
By focusing our power distribution to Research Facilities we are able to boost the efficiency of all our colonies.
Reproduction Capacity
Allows for Assembly of more Yor.
By Focusing our power distribution to Reproduction we have been able to increase the number of Yor than can be powered on all of our colonies.
Fusion Matrix
Allows creation of Fusion Matrix.
The Fusion Matrix lets us generate more power, given our people, our facilities, and our limbs all the energy they need to function.
Power Matrix Focus
Improves power plants.
We have many demands for our power supplies, and scheduling calculations have yet to reveal optimal sharing solutions. We will prioritize which sectors receive priority for power distribution.
Manufacturing Augmentation
Optimizes power plants to boost Manufacturing.
Modifying our power facilities to make use of the limited range of interfaces used by manufacturing Yor will greatly increase their productive capacity.
Research Augmentaion
Optimizes power plants to boost Research.
Modifying our power facilities to include the specialized interfaces used by our creative Yor for their experiments will greatly increase their research capacity.
Reproductive Augmentation
Increase Population Capacity of our worlds.
By adjusting power allocation protocols to prioritize individual Yor power and sustenance, we can sustain higher populations on our worlds.
Antimatter Matrix
Allows creation of the Antimatter Matrix.
The newest iteration of the Power Matrix will allow our worlds to support more Yor, and make those Yor more efficient at what they do.
AntiMatter Mastery
Improves power plants.
Yor of all dispositions are insatiable in their demand for power; as our supply increases, so do their demands. We will have to target which sectors we calculate have the most potential to prosper.
Social Efficacy
Increase Adjacency bonus to all improvements.
As our power supply increases, we are able to provide energy to a wider range of facilities and Yor, greatly increasing the efficiency of all Yor activities.
Reproductive Efficacy
Increase the efficacy of Assembly Project

The galaxy can not have enough Yor, to counterbalance its perverse preference for organic life. We will dedicate excess power to the sustenance of greater quantities of Yor, to help bring True Singularity closer.
Quantum Matrix
Allows creation of the Quantum Matrix.
The Quantum Matrix is the ultimate planetary power source. Yor facilities will be more efficient. Yor will be more numerous. Yor limbs will be more numerous and efficient.
Quantum Miniaturization
Provides individual Yor their own nearly limitless power plant.
The Quantum Matrix can power individual quantum power cells that provide individual Yor energy, greatly increasing the amount of Yor each of our colonies can support.
Planet Utilization
Allows for Increased planet utilization.
We require a foundation upon which to build perfection, worlds and resources to colonize and plunder. And first, those must be cleansed of biological contamination.
Planetary Specialization
Improves colonial structures.

Yor structures are designed in harmony with the design of the Yor themselves. As Yor can be customized with new limbs, structures can be customized with new handles. We will modify our structures to suit the Yor we wish to house there.
Accelerated Reproduction
Allows for Assembly of more Yor.
Installing a new version of reproductive instruction sets in our creches will ensure we have enough Yor to impose our will on the worlds we occupy.
Enhanced Production
Increases production.
Optimizing the bodies of the Yor to suit the specific environmental challenges of the worlds they occupy will increase their productivity.
Mining Specialization
Increase strategic resource yields.

The importance of controlling any given resource cannot be precisely calculated, depending on too many unknown variables. But the probable ranges these calculations produce, suggest that these resources are vital to ensuring our consistent growth.
Spark of Life
Increase our ability to create new Yor Life Sparks, with the Fast Assembly Project.

The gift of sentience takes the form of a Spark, unique to each Yor. Our reproductive creches can create new Sparks using a mysterious process we only partially understand. But we will continue to iterate and improve upon it, as we do with all things.
Spark Replication
Allows the duplication of Mature Life Sparks, with the High Capacity Assembly Project.
Our understanding of Spark creation has advanced to the point where we can replicate the Sparks of mature, specialized Yor. This will reduce startup costs, and increase our population growth rates.
Spark Continuity
Allows Life Sparks to be transferred to new vessels, with the Ultimate Assembly Project.

In time, even the greatest of the Yor lose cohesion as their Spark fades. Our latest breakthrough allows us to seamlessly transfer this Spark to a new Unit and rejuvenate it, allowing our great minds to live on indefinitely.
Hives
Allows for the construction of the Dimensional Hive.
This universe is very difficult to adapt to. By establishing a dimensional hive on our worlds we maintain a bond with our former universe, keeping our bodies healthy and strong.
Hive Specialization
Allows our hives to specialize in different ways to grow and adapt to this universe.
Helpful Hives
Lowers the Maintenance of all improvements.
Our hives have taken it upon themselves to help maintain our colonies, greatly reducing our maintenance expenses.
Productive Hives
Lowers the manufacturing cost of all improvements.
Our hives have taken it upon themselves to help with the construction of new facilities. This not only saves us credits, but it saves us time.
Gaia Theory
Allows for the construction of the Gaia Vortex achievement.
By building a Gaia Vortex on one of our worlds, we are able to pull pure life energy from our home universe, and distribute it to our worlds.
Mother Hives
Allows for the construction of the Mother Hive.
Once fully adapted to this universe, our hives become things of wonder, allowing for the free exchange of thoughts between this universe and our own.
Hyperion Matrix
Allows the construction of the Hyperion Matrix achievement.
The Hyperion Matrix is a repository of knowledge from our universe. It allows us to adapt our knowledge to the technologies of this universe at greatly accelerated rate.
Gravitonics
Increase the Hull Capacity of our ships.
Our knowledge of gravity is far beyond that of any of this universe's native races. We have been able to apply it to our ship construction which allows us to carry more components of any kind.
Gravitonic Specialization
Focusing our study of gravitonics can allow us to lower the mass of specialized systems.
Offensive Gravitonics
Reduce the Mass of our weapons systems.
By specializing in our gravitonic technologies we have been able to shrink our weapons systems substantially, allowing us to carry more of them.
Defensive Gravitonics
Reduce the Mass of our defense systems.
By specializing in our gravitonic technologies, we have been able to shrink our defense systems substantially. Which allows us to better defend ourselves from this universe's natives.
System Gravitonics
Reduce the Mass of drive, life support and sensor systems.
By specializing in our gravitonic technologies we have been able to shrink the components required to explore the galaxy, giving us a substantial edge over the natives when looking for new worlds.
Gravitonic Manipulation
Increase Hull Capacity of our ships.
With further study, we have been able to push our knowledge of gravatonics to new levels. Our ships can now carry even more components of all kinds.
Gravitonic Mastery
Increase Hull Capacity of our ships.
We have mastered mass and gravity to the point that our ships can new carry more equipment than any other race in this universe.
Precursor Legacy
Allows for the creation of the Precursor Archive achievement.

As the heir of the Precursors, we have been able to gather all our collective knowledge into a archive, that contains many of the Precursor secrets, and gives us a decided advantage over the other races.
Precursor Traditions
Increase shipyard output and quality.
As the heir of the Precursors we know that our ships are more than our tools, they are our loyal companions.
Precursor Specialization
With the lessons we have learned form the our Precursor Traditions, we have been able to find new ways to make our ships superior to all others.
Healing Hulls
Our ships will repair themselves in battle.
Though our ships are still no match for the great living beings that used to travel the stars, we have been able to learn enough to allow them to slowly heal on their own in battle.
Intelligent Ships
Reduces the Logistics of our ships.

Our ships can literally work together, even without our aid. This allows us to field more ships with less logistical expense, allowing our fleets to grow larger than any seen since the time of the Precursors.
Organic Materials
Increases the Hit Points of our ships.
The Organic Materials we use to create our ships, are not only more beautiful, but stronger.
Precursor Mysteries
Allows us to build the Precursor Protection Field support module.
We have discovered one how to reproduce a powerful Precursor Artifact. Though difficult to produce, it can make almost any fleet nearly indestructible.
Living Ships
Our ships no longer need to be Maintained, and will self heal
We are now able to create living ships. Unlike our pervious forays into artificial life, they have proven to be loyal and helpful companions.
Precursor Sole
Allows construction of the Dream Conclave Achievement
The Precursors taught us that the study of the universe is the key to happiness, and will lead us to greater things, some of them helpful.
Acquisitions
Improves military effectiveness.

Our business must grow. And when the galaxy doesn't provide us empty worlds to grow with, we may have to acquire them from other parties. Developing the tools and techniques to do that now is more than prudent.
Acquisition Specialization
Improves our military systems.
Our security forces will have a much easier time acquiring other assets if the tools they use to do so are the best they can be.
Marketing
Allows for the construction of the Iridium Store.

Our storefronts and marketplaces are more than just a place to earn a profit, although they certainly do that. They also serve as the public face of our company, the truest representation of what we are, and help spread our influence in the marketplace.
Marketing Specialization
Improves Marketing Potential

Marketing is one of the most important aspects of our business. The potential to increase profits or improve our corporate image is immense, and any resources spent here are assuredly ones spent wisely.
Brand Awareness
Increases Store Influence.
Marketing efforts which focus on the quality of our products will help increase the acceptance of our brand, ensuring that our base of potential customers continues to grow.
Brand Quality
Increases Store Profits.
With the right marketing push we can ensure our consumers believe Iridium products are the highest quality, and worthy of the premium prices we'll soon start charging.
Interstellar Commerce
Allows construction of Iridium Center Improvement

A new generation of retail hub will be needed to showcase our latest products and services in the best possible light. Iridium Centers will increase the economic output of every world they're constructed on.
Economic Focus
Increases income.

The Iridium Corporation is involved in multiple lines of business, ensuring a nice healthy mix of revenue sources. But when business conditions dictate it, we can also choose to specialize in a specific field, to try and maximize the income we receive there.
Trade Economy
Increases trade route income.

If our external trading activities are unusually profitable, it's only rational to ramp those up, whether by increasing the volume of goods traded, or transitioning our product mix to include higher-margin commodities.
Well Crafted Treaties
Increases Diplomatic trade income
If we want to reassign some of our shrewdest negotiators to our external treaties division, we can expect to see a little more income from those.
Tourism Board
Increases tourism income.

Tourism is an incredibly attractive business, bringing in external revenue to our economy. If we have the infrastructure to handle it, encouraging more tourists to travel here is practically printing free money.
Marketing Masters
Allows construction of The Iridium World Improvement

Throughout the galaxy, sentient life talks of the marvels present in an Iridium World complex. Providing the ultimate consumption experience, Iridium Worlds boost the economy of their host worlds like few other structures.
Coordination Temple
Allows construction of the Coordination Temple.
The coordination of labor and spiritual health of our devoted workers can be tended to by specially trained curates who already have mastered critical aspects of the Path.
Labor Mission
Allows construction of the Labor Mission.

The purpose of the Path is to ensure that every person has the rules and structure needed to find their own personal happiness, and eventually the Way. Facilities to assist workers with this journey will help them contribute better to our civilization.
Labor Oracle
Allows construction of the Labor Oracle.

On rare nights, Krynn are born that possess the ability to see into another's eyes and take the true measure of their potential. By placing these gifted individuals in the right places, we can ensure all our workers are walking the proper Path for them.
Jihad
Allows Holy War to commence.
The galaxy is filled with close-minded individuals who resist being shown the Path, or even struggle against it. They must be dealt with harshly. Our own salvation rests on their conversion.
Krynniac Jihad
Improves planetary Holy War capabilities.
Those that fallow the Path have no fear, their faith filling them with confidence and a strength that can be used against the unbelievers in a variety of ways.
Shadow Warriors
Increase Soldiering Ability.

Those that follow The Path of Shadows understand that when Force is called for, it must be total, overwhelming, and unstoppable. When the unbelievers meet our Shadow Warriors they shall see the truth of the Path firsthand.
Devout Defenders
Increases Resistance
The Path teaches that when our lives and salvation are under threat, everyone that walks the Path, regardless of caste or clan, must defend the Way to their dying breath.
Steadfast Faith
Planets resist culture flipping much longer.
The Path teaches that it is the only acceptable means of finding salvation, and that the customs of unbelievers should be shunned, as they are anathema to the Way.
Divine Fleets
Allows for the construction of the Divine Temple Support Module.
Divine Temples can be installed on appropriately anointed vessels, providing all ships in a fleet a certainty of purpose that they are fighting a righteous cause.
Divine Mastery
Improves ship based Holy War capabilities.
Crews and officers that fully master the Path and comprehend the Way in all its beauty will find that the weapons of the unbelievers hold less menace for them.
Undaunted Crews
Increases the Hit points of all our ships.
Those who truly walk the Path do not feel the pains inflicted by the world, and will not panic when a ship is crumbling around them, standing and fighting until their last breath.
Righteous Strength
Increases the defenses of all our ships.

Whether it's due to the ingenuity of our crews, or the intervention of a higher power, our dedication to the Path gives our ship's defenses a righteous strength that helps protect against even the most devastating attacks.
The Path of Shadows
Allows construction of the Shadow Temple.

There have always been those who cannot find the Path, and even some who threaten its existence. To combat these influences, the Krynniac faith has established the Path of Shadows, whose followers preserve the prosperity of the Krynn in their own way.
Shadow Enforcers
Allows construction of the Enforcement Temple.

The Path does not permit exploitation without authorization. Authorization granted to those that walk the Path of Shadows, who are free to collect tithes from devoted merchants and bankers to ensure their businesses suffer no misfortunes.
Shadow Trade
Increases the Income of trade routes, by allowing the trade of dubious goods.

The Path of Shadows teaches that unbelievers will destroy themselves if given what they want most. Properly equipped with the right "merchandise," our traders can now profit from their customers' gluttony.
Krynniac Conversion
Increase tourism income and influence on all our worlds.
Our mastery of tourism is finally paying dividends. All who visit our worlds find themselves filled with the urge to return home and extol the virtues of the Path to their own kind.
Unbroken Spirit
Boost the Hitpoints of our ships.
Our crews have tasted the lash of slavery, but they have not broken. Now they and their ships have the ability to withstand even the harshest onslaughts.
Defensive Discipline
Makes our ship crews more effective when in defensive maneuvers.
Our pilots have learned to link with their ships, and though disciplined thoughts, they can now maneuver their ships, with a nimbleness far beyond normal manual control.
Defensive Trance
Greatly increase the abilities of our ships to withstand damage.

Some of our more gifted pilots have taken the Defensive Discipline to a new level. They can go into a trance, becoming one with their ships. Allowing them to control their ships like their own bodies. The end result is they are able to move through intensive fire without faltering.
Healing Waters
Allows for the constuction of the Healing Waters Improvement

Despite our ability to live on air breathing worlds, we still forever yearn for the healing waters of our ancestors. We now have the ability to bring these waters to new worlds, for our people to bathe in and be refreshed.
Wellness Falls
Allows for the construction of the Wellness Falls Improvement.
The presence of the Wellness Falls will not only refresh and revitalize the morale of our people, it will increase their productivity when they return to their everyday lives.
Approval Focus
Increases approval on specific planets.

Our cultural engineers inform us that some well planned manipulations of our cultural materials could make our people happier with what they already have. Which seems too good of an opportunity to pass up.
Easy to Please
Increase the morale of your colonies.
We have discovered that with little more than the sound of running water, we can make people feel more confident and happy without all the costly infrastructure that normally requires.
Easily Distracted
Makes building Entertainment Improvements much cheaper.
We have discovered that our efforts in keeping our people distracted have paid off. We can now build anything they want and they'll think it's fun and terrific.
Eager to Please
Greatly reduces the Maintenance required by Entertainment Improvements.
Not only are our people easier to please, they will now do most of the work it takes to distract themselves, for free.
Cleansing Tide
Allows the construction of a Cleansing Tide Improvement.

We have learned how to reproduce the waters of our home world on any planet. With this technology our citizens, no matter how far from their home world, will be able to replenish themselves in the Cleansing Tides of Toria.
Xeno Geology
Increase the quality of our colonies, by lowering maintenance and increasing morale of all our colonies.

Over the ages we have learned that to get the most of a world, you must understand its strengths and weaknesses. By studying a world before we build it out, we have found we can improve the overall quality of life of all its citizens.
Weather Control
Allows for the building of the Arcean Weather Control Improvement
By maintaining a balanced weather system we are able to increase the overall quality of our planets, improving the overall usefulness of almost all of our endeavors.
Weather Control Zenith
Allows for the building of the Arcean Weather Control Zenith
With a new Zenith Weather control system, we can not only maintain a stable weather pattern on a colony, we can bend the weather to our will, greatly increasing the overall productivity of any world.
Interstellar Navigation
Allow the building of the Navigation Center Achievement

Since leaving our home world, the Arcean people have always been great navigators, able to traverse the stars even before the invention of the hyperdrive. The introduction of faster than light travel has done nothing to diminish our skills.
Navigation Network
Allow the building of the Galactic Navigation Network

Our interstellar navigators have built a vast network that spans the galaxy. A headquarters where they can direct this network and better coordinate their knowledge will increase their mastery of interstellar space, allowing our ships to move through the galaxy with a surety undreamed of by lesser races.
Navigational Expertise
Allow the building of the Galactic Navigators Guild

The best navigators in the galaxy are completely reliant on our Navigation Network. The Guild they've formed to regulate its use has given us access to navigational knowhow from across the galaxy, giving our Empire the best navigation techniques in the galaxy.
Stellar Forge
Allows the constuction of the Stellar Forge Improvement.

Our researchers are working on several exciting new ways to optimize the construction of our ships. By putting these researchers together in a single facility, we'll ensure these breakthroughs are made, and then filter out to all planets where our ships are constructed.
Stellar Optimization
Improves Ship Construction
The Arcean researchers who labor in the Stellar Forge have requested direction on where to focus their research.
Stellar Enhancement
Slightly Increase the hit point of all our ships.
By focusing the efforts of our Stellar Forge teams on durability, we have found several techniques that can be used to increase the durability of all our ships, no matter where they are built.
Stellar Fortification
Substantially lowers the maintinance costs of all our ships.

Our Stellar Forge teams have improved the durability, ease of access, and construction costs of every vital component within our ships. Our entire fleet should see substantially reduced maintenance costs now.
Robust Hull Construction
Allows us to build unique hull strengthening components.

Our Stellar Forge teams have found a way to install a portable version of the Integrity fields they use when building ships within the ship itself. This will increase each ship's hit points and greatly increase its rate of repair.
Hull Repair Systems
Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.
The same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can now be used to conduct partial repairs as well, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.
Temple of Valor
Allows the building of the Temple of Valor Improvement.
By studying the great warriors of our past, our children learn the importance of Valor, giving them an ideal to look up to, and a way to focus their more aggressive tendencies.
Territorial Reinforcement
Allows for the construction of special military starbase modules that can be built on any starbase.

Recent experiences have taught us that the best way to ensure our planets remain unmolested is to keep our enemies far, far away from them. By adding military capacity to even our most utilitarian starbases, we will ensure our forces always have a safe place to rally and resupply.
Reinforcement Optimization
Improves Starbase Defenses
Our Starbase commanders have great political power, and insist more resources be spent on increasing their defensive capacity.
Starbase Reinforcement
Increase the hitpoints of all Starbases
As our Empire expands, we find it increasingly important to ensure that our starbases are well protected, able to withstand raids from the most aggressive pirates.
Starbase Guardians
All starbases receive 2 Intercepter drones to augment their exsiting defenses.
Every weapon counts when it comes to defending Arcean territory. By installing Interceptor drones on all existing starbases, we're able to better secure our territory and resources.
Starbase Fortification
Alows for the building of the Intersteller Defense Module on any starbase.

Our research teams have found a way to install military grade defense augmentation systems on non military starbases. With this breakthrough we should be able to better secure our borders and protect our worlds and assets.
Starbase Fortification Focus
Improves Starbase Fortifications
The Arcean people grow anxious at the threats the galaxy poses, and insist that more resources be spent to increase our Empire's fortifications.
Starbase Battle Coordination
Increases the weapons strength of all weapons on our starbases
Using a recent breakthrough in field-of-fire coordination, we have been able to design a firmware update for our starbase defense modules that increases the damage dealt by existing weapons systems.
Starbase Defense Coordination
Increases the defenses of all starbases
A new scaled-up version of our integrity field strengthening technology allows us to boost the overall defenses of all of our starbases.
Zalon Defense System
Build the Zalon Defense system on a starbase or ship.

Our research efforts into starbase fortification have proven quite fruitful. The Zalon Defense System will not only be the most advanced 'civilian' starbase defense array in the known galaxy, it will also be small enough to be equipped on a ship.
Observation
Let us study the technology of other races.
The Snathi are known thoughout the galaxy as the ultimate Scavengers. Not just for the ships we take, but for the technologies that we glean from the simple observation of our enemies.
Recovery
Learn to make use of the resources already floating around the galaxy.
There is plenty of perfectly good stuff out there in the galaxy that we can make use of. With a little effort, we can get our little hands on that stuff before anyone else does.
Scavenging
Boost our Scavenging Rate when victorious in battle.
Why build new ships? With a little repair work, you can use your enemy's ships against them.
Scavenging Specialization
Get more out of the ships you scavenge
Our knack for salvaging ships comes in handy, but with a bit of work we can pry even more goodies out of them.
Research Scavenging
Use salvaged ships to boost Research per turn.
We have discovered that if we carefully dismantle some of the enemy ships we salvage, we are able to learn some fun new tricks. This should greatly increase our research rates.
Structural Scavenging
Use salvaged ships to strengthen your fleets.
After studying some of the ships we have scavenged we now realize that we might want to focus more on the integrity of our hulls. It seems to have the added advantage of keeping them in one piece.
Smart Scavenging
Allows us to repair scavenged ships quicker after battle.
Our crews have found new and exciting new ways to repair the ships they scavenge at a record pace. This has the added advantage of making repairs more efficient on their own ships as well.
Creative Recycling
Increases Scavenging Rate and boosts Military Production.

Our fleets have become so efficient at scavenging enemy ships that they have found that found better ways to recylce these ships. This has given us a substantial boost to Manufacturing on all our colonies.
Ultimate Scavengers
Boosts our Scavenging Rate when victorious in battles.
Our fleets have learned where to exactly to hit in order to disable ships. As a result, our Scavenging Rates are at an all time high.
Vicious
Increase Soldiering and Resistance.

The Snathi know that being small makes us vulnerable to the larger races. However, we make up for our size with pure viciousness. There are many advantages to always starting a battle with a low blow.
Colonization
Allows construction of colony modules and basic colony buildings.
For generations mankind has dreamed of setting foot on other worlds. That dream is now a reality. Feet are being set on other worlds. We're setting lots of things on other worlds actually.
Xeno Industrialization
Allows for the construction of more advanced manufacturing improvements.

Everything is harder on the surface of an alien world, every machine we own having to be adjusted for the differences in gravity or atmosphere, all our old constants and empirical shortcuts having to be thrown out and re-written.
